courses.description:
Diseña y Presenta tus Proyectos Profesionales con Canva
Representa tus Ideas y Diseños de forma más Atractiva, Intuitiva y Eficaz. Curso 100% práctico. De 0 a Experto.
Instructores: Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Actualizado: Septiembre del 2025  Estudiantes: +10.100 Calificación: 4.5/5  Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Impulsa tu comunicación con Canva y crea presentaciones profesionales, dossiers, infografías y portfolios que venden tus ideas. En este curso de Canva de 0 a experto, aprenderás tipografía, color, composición, branding (kit de marca), uso de plantillas y storytelling visual para transformar información compleja en mensajes claros y memorables.
Impartido en Udemy, 100% online, global y para todos los niveles, dominarás flujos rápidos: redes sociales, pitch decks, currículum, mockups, animación y exportaciones optimizadas. Incluye buenas prácticas, recursos descargables y un método práctico para diseñar más atractivo, intuitivo y eficaz, elevando tu portfolio y tu valor profesional desde el primer proyecto.
Bienvenido al curso completo para Creativos de Presentaciones de Canva. En este curso aprenderás a comprender cómo usar y diseñar presentaciones de diapositivas impresionantes con la aplicación gratuita de CanvaPresentaciones.
Canva es un software de presentación gratuito que te permite diseñar presentaciones visualmente atractivas tanto para un entorno profesional como informal. En comparación con otros programas como Microsoft Powerpoint, Canva ofrece el beneficio de la simplicidad. Con sus diversas plantillas y temas, puede ser tan simple como insertar texto en los cuadros de texto proporcionados. Sin embargo, con este curso aprenderás a  llevar tu  presentación un paso más allá agregando personalizaciones para conquistar a tu audiencia.
¡Insertando  imágenes, animaciones, transiciones, gráficos y diagramas, sorprenderás a tu audiencia!
Este curso comenzará desde lo básico; primero entendiendo los beneficios de presentar con Canva y cómo configurar una presentación desde cero o desde una plantilla. Luego aprenderás en las siguientes lecciones las funciones de diseño de Presentaciones de Canva . Las lecciones de esta sección incluyen comprender cómo usar el cuadro de texto, cómo crear gráficos, cómo insertar vínculos y más.
Aprenderás también  cómo editar un patrón para personalizar aún más sus diapositivas, insertar diagramas que llamen la atención para mostrar datos y aplicar máscaras de imagen para transformar fotos. Además, las ganancias rápidas se encuentran dispersas en estas tres secciones para brindar más consejos sobre cómo crear presentaciones impresionantes y cautivadoras.
La sencilla interfaz de usuario de Presentaciones de Canva engaña a los usuarios para que no aprovechen al máximo las herramientas que se ofrecen. Por lo tanto, hay una sección que describe rápidamente la creación de algunas diapositivas comunes para mostrar cómo la combinación de estas funciones simples y básicas puede llevarlo a presentaciones de diapositivas impresionantes. Dado que las presentaciones deben adaptarse a su tema, estos ejemplos no se ajustan a todos los temas de presentación. Sin embargo, una vez que comprenda y se familiarice con las herramientas de Presentaciones de Canva , podrá seguir su creatividad y dar vida a sus visiones de diapositivas.
Canva  es una poderosa aplicación que te permite diseñar hermosas presentaciones para todas las ocasiones. Este curso también le mostrará cómo fortalecer tus habilidades de colaboración y comunicación para que puedas trabajar en conjunto en presentaciones de diapositivas desde la comodidad de tu casa.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción y Bienvenida al curso "Crea Presentaciones Impactantes con Canva"
Introducción a las Presentaciones Efectivas
Introducción a Presentacion con Canva Presentaciones
Comenzamos a Hacer Nuestra Presentación en Canva
Recursos para el Alumno del curso "Crea Presentaciones Impactantes con Canva"
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso "Crea Presentaciones Impactantes con Canva "


Objetivos del curso:
Dominar Canva de 0 a experto para crear presentaciones, dossiers, infografías, pitch decks, redes sociales y portfolios. Aprenderás tipografía, color, composición, kit de marca, plantillas, storytelling visual, animación y exportaciones optimizadas, con flujos de trabajo rápidos y consistentes.


Salidas profesionales:
Podrás desempeñarte como diseñador/a de contenidos, presentations designer, social media manager, creador/a para marketing y ventas, freelance en branding y comunicación visual. Eleva tu portfolio, mejora la tasa de conversión de tus propuestas y entrega piezas limpias, coherentes y listas para cliente.


Dirigido a:
Estudiantes, profesionales y emprendedores de cualquier sector; docentes, equipos de marketing y pymes que necesitan comunicar mejor y más rápido. Formato Udemy, 100% online, global y para todos los niveles: aprende a tu ritmo con métodos prácticos y resultados profesionales desde el primer proyecto.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, Inscríbete y aprende a usar Canva  y crea presentaciones impresionantes. este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Estudiantes y principiantes que quieren dominar Canva y crear presentaciones profesionales rápidas y efectivas.
Emprendedores y pymes que necesitan branding consistente, plantillas, pitch decks y contenidos para redes sociales que conviertan.
Profesionales de marketing y ventas que buscan subir la conversión con diseños claros, infografías y dossiers listos para cliente.
Docentes y formadores que quieren materiales didácticos atractivos: fichas, clases y vídeos con identidad visual unificada.
Freelancers, creadores y community managers que desean plantillas pro, flujo ágil y portfolio potente con Canva de 0 a experto.

courses.description:
YOU MAY WANT TO READ THIS BEFORE YOU DO ANYTHING ELSE ON THIS PAGE - A LOOK INTO NEUROMARKETING & WHAT THE MARKETING PSYCHOLOGY OF IMPULSE OFFERS


Do you often struggle with marketing ideas to make people buy from you or your clients?


Do you often try to “sell” but people don't always seem very interested in buying from you?


Do your marketing efforts often feel like a waste of time and money because they hardly provide a suitable return on investment?


Are you tired of trying quick “marketing hacks” that promise to fix your marketing problems overnight?


If this is you, then you might be interested in reading this until the END


If this doesn't sound like you then I believe you're here to learn something new to help avoid marketing problems in the future


And if this doesn’t sound like you, and you’re not here to learn something new to help avoid marketing problems in the future then I suggest you feel free to close this browser window now!


BUT stay and read until the END if this sounds like something you would benefit greatly from.


I can decide to tell you this is going to make you 10 times money than you made from your marketing efforts last month, but I don't want to be that guy (I'm sure you know them)


So I won't be selling you the regular promises you must have heard a thousand times, promises such as:


– The knowledge you're about to get will grow your business overnight and make you enough money to finally quit your job and travel the world


– What you're about to read will change your life, make you debt free, and secure the future of your family (no more rainy days).


– The knowledge you gain will make you a marketing wizard who can make any business a money making venture




No fancy promises, Yup you read that right!


Nothing glamorous so sorry to disappoint you if you came to this page to read the same fancy promises you've been falling for but have gotten you no results, yet you hope the next glamourous “marketing hack” will change your life so you keep buying.


Instead I will be sharing with you the most overlooked non secret (yes, it's not even a secret anymore and I don't think it has ever been) that could teach you how to:


– Unlock the reasons your marketing efforts have not been very successful


– Understand the underlying cause behind why everyone wants to buy certain products


– Know how urges work in humans, and how to make people buy from you using those urges.




I'll be sharing this marketing psychology and neuromarketing nonsecret with you
But only if you're prepared to:


– Practice until you finally succeed


– Accept the knowledge is not a magic trick that will make you a magician overnight


– Be ready to use the materials as a handbook to remind yourself of what you have learnt




Everyone knows and experiences what I'm about to share with you daily or even hourly but only a few business owners and marketers are able to tap into this to make their marketing efforts pay off


So what is the non secret I am trying not to overhype? well, this marketing psychology non secret lies in your BRAIN


When was the last time you had a very compelling urge? the type that didn't just go away until it was satisfied


3 days ago? Yesterday? Last night? This morning?


Well, in this course I'll be showing you:


– The underlying factor behind these compelling urges


– How these urges are created


– How these urges turn us into product consuming zombies who will buy until we're in debt


– How to make your products, services, and marketing messages activate the “product-consuming” Zombie state to make people buy from you more than they buy from John (yes, that competitor who makes you lower your prices because he keeps stealing your customers)




So what is the cost of all of this? All I ask again is:


– Practice until you finally succeed


– Accept the knowledge is not a magic trick that will make you a magician overnight


– Be ready to use the materials as a handbook to remind yourself of what you have learnt


Yup! Just those things, I promise not to ask for your soul (haha)


But what if you get in but don't think I've shown you all that I mentioned ?


Well you get your money back for time wasted and a peek into the non secret that teaches you How to make your products, services, and marketing messages activate the “product-consuming” Zombie state to make people buy from you more than they buy from John


Who This Is Not For


This is not for people who would rather:


– Sell their souls than try to understand and practice


– Buy a magic wand to make their marketing efforts pay off overnight


But I believe you're not one of those because you've been reading this for quite a while, or are you?


Honestly I think it'll be better if you paid a magician to solve all your marketing problems in an hour or less, but then all magicians do is sell illusions so would you rather live with this reality and have a chance to fix a part of your marketing using Neuromarketing and the marketing psychology of impulses, or buy a grand illusion?


Alright, time's up!


I believe you have made your decision so what would it be? Get the knowledge on:


– How to Unlock the reasons your marketing efforts have not been very successful


– The underlying factor behind these compelling urges


– How these urges are created


– How these urges turn us into product consuming zombies who will buy until we're in debt


– How to make your products, services, and marketing messages activate the “product-consuming” Zombie state to make people buy from you more than they buy from John (Remember John?)


Or would you rather get a magician to sell you a magic wand?


And uhmm sorry if this wasn't for you, you can continue to enjoy the rest of your day *winks*

courses.description:
This course is covered with Business to Business (B2B) Marketing and Business to Consumer (B2C) Marketing as well as Best Marketing Tactics. You will learn about Paid Marketing, Pay Per Click, Sponsorship, Endorsement and Influencer, Referral Program, Affiliate, Research, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Blogging, Email Marketing Tactics for Product Marketing.
What Is Product Marketing? Product marketing actually starts with the customer. It is closely concerned with understanding the buyer and their journey, using this information to build a blueprint for positioning, targeting, launching, promoting, driving demand, encouraging adoption, and ensuring success of a product. Product marketing is the driving force behind getting products to market - and keeping them there. Product marketers are the overarching voices of the customer, masterminds of messaging, enablers of sales, and accelerators of adoption. All at the same time.

You are interested in learning how to collaborate with brand.

objectives: What is SaaS marketing and how it is different from traditional marketing.

requirements: No marketing experience needed. We'll cover everything from basics to advanced.
courses.description:
In this SaaS Marketing course, we will learn the fundamentals of marketing software as a service business. I have worked with 20+ SaaS companies, including Knorex, GrowthPlug, Sopact, Klearstack, and many more.


This course informs you about the fundamentals of SaaS marketing in a structured way. I have divided this course into multiple sections, each focusing on one key aspect of SaaS Marketing.


Section 1: SaaS Marketing Fundamentals
Understand the difference between SaaS and traditional marketing funnels and how the challenges and strategy differ between B2B and B2C SaaS companies. We'll also understand multiple pricing models with the pros and cons of each so that, you can make an informed decision.


Section 2: Learn about acquisition strategies
In these videos, we'll see some ways to ensure a continuous flow of users for your SaaS product. This is important to ensure that you keep generating recurrent revenue and compensate for customer loss over time.


Section 4: Customer Segmentation
Learn about the parameters you should use for customer segmentation and what an ideal buyer persona looks like. We have included external resources as well to help with customer segmentation for your business.


Section 5: SaaS Email Marketing Strategies
Email marketing is critical to the success of any SaaS business. You’ll need it at every stage of your funnel. That’s why we will dedicate a few videos to help you fine-tune your email marketing. We'll also learn quick call-to-action hacks and strategies to re-engage users who lost touch with your brand.


Section 6: Product Onboarding Strategies
40 – 60% of users who registered for a free trial barely used the product. Such users may never convert into paying customers if we don’t practice appropriate customer onboarding strategies in SaaS businesses. Hence, we'll have dedicated sessions to improve user onboarding.


Section 7: SaaS Marketing Metrics
SaaS marketing metrics play an important role in your success. You need metrics to verify if your strategies are working or not. We'll learn both basic and advanced SaaS metrics to help you track your progress and make insightful decisions. In this section, we also develop an understanding of unit economics in SaaS business and what makes a product-based business profitable.


Section 8: Customer Retention 101
32% of the people will shift to an alternate product just after one negative experience, despite previously excellent customer service. Hence, is it important that we see how to keep users for your software.


Section 9: Affiliate Marketing for SaaS
Affiliate marketing is critical for SaaS marketing success. Learn the best practices for choosing an affiliate partner, the metrics to track, and the mistakes to avoid.


Section 10: What's Product Led Growth?
Understand the ideology of product-led growth and practical ways to implement it in your business. We'll also discuss some success stories of companies that have already implemented this.


Section 11: Writing a Great PR Pitch for SaaS Businesses
Learn how to write an effective PR pitch that gathers the attention of media houses. You can use this for new features and product launches.


By the end of this course, you will have enough understanding of SaaS marketing that you can create your own marketing strategy, understand the challenges and effectiveness of your marketing team, and gear your product to success.

Entrepreneurs
SaaS Founders

courses.description:
Most organisations routinely review their direct competitors, capture what they're up to in a slide deck and don't actually do anything with it.


To get value from conducting a competitor review, you need to break down the entire customer journey, know who you should really be trying to outperform and then focus on the things that are unique to you.


Get practical by analysing your competitors to find features with low maturity through scoring. Know how to apply customer and brands lenses through a proven methodology. Stop being too scared to launch services that aren't tried and tested. Demonstrate to leadership why these opportunities will provide growth.




Creating your Customer Journey Framework
Stop pretending you have a customer journey. You don't. No one does. Know how to create your category specific framework to enable you to conduct maturity assessments, create a common language for your whole organisation, and to take control of your customer experience.


Conducting a heuristic review
Change hearts and minds in your organisation by collaborating with colleagues to identify competitors and comparators. Know how to conduct detailed scoring and capture current experiences.


Applying unique lenses
There will be many opportunities - but most won't be a fit for your organisation, nor can you support so many initiatives. Learn how to apply your customer goals and brand values to isolate features that are needed and unique to your organisation.


Persuade leadership
Package evidence to convince your peers and leadership why these are the correct strategies to drive growth and to develop the first-mover advantage, always keeping you ahead and leaving your competitors to play perpetual catch-up.
target_audience: Product managers wanting to know where to focus to build customer engagement through evidence

courses.description:
INTERNATIONALLY ACCREDITED & CERTIFIED COURSE!
POBA is an Accredited Organization
Unlock your full potential as a writer with our "Get Published" Master Class: Indie & Traditional Secrets. This course is your gateway to mastering both self-publishing and traditional publishing. Learn the entire process from start to finish, including manuscript formatting, book marketing, and creating compelling book covers. Gain insider knowledge on being represented by an agent and the business of publishing. With practical tutorials and strategies, you'll overcome writer's block, set realistic goals, and build a loyal audience. Don't miss this opportunity to transform your writing journey and achieve lasting success. Enroll now and start your path to becoming a successful, published author!


At a glance what you'll learn
Get Published Master Class: Tutorial & Marketing Strategy
Get Published, Indie & Traditional Publishing
Learn: Self-Publishing, KDP Amazon, eBook Creation, Book Marketing, Writing a Book, Book Cover Design
Learn Amazon/Kobo/BN/Goodreads & More
Hello, wonderful students!
First, let me share a bit about myself and why you might want to take this course with me. I am a published author, both independently and traditionally, with over thirty years of writing experience. I have a unique perspective, having witnessed the industry evolve from a time when traditional publishing was the only option. Back then, we sent out hard copy manuscripts via snail mail, complete with self-addressed stamped envelopes, and waited patiently for acceptance or rejection letters.
I also experienced the early days of self-publishing, which was initially met with skepticism and threats from traditional publishers who claimed that self-published authors would never be considered "real" writers. Fast forward to today, and we see many best-selling authors emerging from self-published Kindle and print books. The landscape has changed dramatically, with expansive marketing options allowing self-published books to reach readers directly. Communities of dedicated readers have formed, empowering authors and diminishing the control of traditional publishers.
In this course, I will share my personal journey through these industry changes and how it felt to navigate the evolving world of publishing. You'll gain insights into the history of the industry from someone who has lived through it all. More importantly, you'll learn everything you need to know to become an author if you choose to take on this challenge. Your success will depend on how you apply the knowledge and instruction provided in this course.
In over 7 hours we go over a wealth of information! Let's look at the details of what is covered in this class!


The History of Traditional & Indy Publishing
Two Styles of Publishing: Traditional & Indy
The Benefits and Deficits of Both Styles of publishing
Being Agented vs Published Traditionally
The Business of Publishing: Indy & Traditional
The Amazon Kindle & Print Publishing Tutorial Start to Finish

How to Market Your Books and Where to Market Your Books

A LIVE Look at How Marketing Worked Hour-By-Hour
Where to Find Support As a Writer

Inside Knowledge of Being Published By a Traditional Publisher

Writers & Authors Journey & Reality, From Dream to Realization

A Publishing Organizer Spread Sheet Resource
How to Handle Vulnerability of Being an Author
Making Mistakes & Correcting Them
There is so much in this course that is not listed here, as every lecture has weaved into it, practical experience and realism from going through the experiences myself and sharing all I have learned and continue to learn. No one is ever perfect in understanding how to get published and as you will see I share even my mistakes and how I corrected them.


If you are also interested in these topics, you will be interested in this course: Content writing, writing, creative writing, technical writing, business writing, academic writing, novel writing, complete creative writing, all genres, writing with flair, writing revenue, write well, get published, get published and earn an income, digital journalism, how to become a bestselling author on amazon kindle, writing skills, authorship, becoming an author, how to become a bestselling author.

requirements: Disponibilidade e vontade de aprender.

courses.description:
Em nosso dia a dia, estamos envolvidos com uma infinidade de produtos, visando atender nossas mais diferentes necessidades. O que muitas vezes não percebemos, é que o desenvolvimento de um produto exige uma série de ações, que vão desde o levantamento das necessidades dos consumidores, passando pelo projeto, desenvolvimento, fabricação, embalagem e finalmente, a distribuição no mercado.
Um aspecto igualmente importante é que os produtos precisam ser movimentados desde a fábrica até o mercado, passando por uma série de intermediários, devem atender a outros requisitos, para que sejam adequados ao transporte e armazenamento, nos diferentes canais até chegar efetivamente ao consumidor final.
Considerando-se a grande quantidade de produtos similares no mercado, é ainda fundamental que o lançamento de um novo produto crie, no consumidor, o desejo de ser experimentado, frente a uma gama enorme de outras possibilidades. Assim, conhecer os produtos concorrentes, as suas vantagens e desvantagens frente ao seu produto, é importante para o sucesso de um lançamento.
Assim, o planejamento e o desenvolvimento de produtos são temas importantíssimos para que o fabricante possa fazer frente à concorrência no mercado, de forma que este reconheça o seu produto como um diferencial em relação aos demais e, portanto, passe a consumi-lo, muitas das vezes substituindo-o por outros já utilizados.
target_audience: Profissionais que atuam nas áreas de marketing, logística, projeto e desenvolvimento de produtos.
Estudantes de cursos de graduação nas áreas de Administração, Marketing, Logística, Engenharia de Produção, entre outras.
Qualquer pessoa que tenha interesse em conhecer de que forma as empresas se organizam para o desenvolvimento e lançamento de novos produtos.

courses.bio: Réussissez comme responsable du développement et du pilotage commercial en entreprise (Management, Ebusines, Evénement)
objectives: Le/la responsable du développement et du pilotage commercial occupe un poste clef au sein de l’entreprise : manager intermédiaire entre les équipes marketing-commerciales et la direction commerciale (ou de l'entreprise), il/elle participe à la réflexion stratégique et traduit ces orientations en décisions commerciales opérationnelles dans son périmètre de responsabilité.

Il/elle gère, anime et développe son unité-zone commerciale (unité de vente, secteur géographique). Il/elle met en œuvre la stratégie commerciale définie par sa direction à travers des actions qui touchent au développement du chiffre d'affaires et de la clientèle dans son périmètre de responsabilité
Il/elle élabore et met en place les plans d'actions en amont et en aval de la vente (analyse du marché, détermination des cibles, plan d’actions marketing, fidélisation…).
Il/elle coordonne, anime et contrôle l’équipe commerciale
Il/elle évalue les actions de développement de clientèle, fait un reporting à sa direction et propose des actions correctives
Il/elle est responsable des budgets qui lui sont alloués pour mener à bien ces différentes actions
Il/elle est dans la quasi totalité des cas impliqué dans le processus de commercialisation

requirements: If you already have a book idea in mind, I'll show you how to take it from idea to bestseller.
courses.description:
Is writing a bestselling book a dream of yours? There's no better way to spread your message, help other people, earn credibility in your industry, and even earn author royalties for your efforts.
But for most people, that's where the dream ends; as they wake up to the daunting reality.
They don't know where to begin, how to publish their work, or how they can possibly get noticed in the sea of 3 million competing titles.
This course puts an end to the confusion and shares the proven, systematic way to take a book from idea to Amazon bestseller.
I've done it myself -- with a book I didn't even have any particular qualifications to write, and I'm confident you can too. That title earned me over $1400 in author royalties in its first month and continues to make sales every day!
We'll walk through step-by-step what's required to get your book to the top of the Amazon charts, starting at the ground level and working our way up.
This course is specifically for people WITHOUT an established "audience" in the form of a big email list or social media following.
You'll learn how to:
Research the competition to best serve your readers.
Find the best keywords and categories for maximum exposure.
Build buzz for your launch and recruit a team of book ambassadors.
Create a winning cover, book description, listing page, and author page.
"Hack" your book content to win in Amazon's search results and gain long-term customers.
Professionally format your book, upload it to Amazon, and even create a paperback version (for free!).
Price your book to optimize sales, income, and perceived value.
Use Amazon's massive reach and internal workings to promote your book for you.
Generate a critical mass of reader reviews.
Leverage dozens of free promotional outlets to spread the word about your book.
Maximize your social media reach on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, and more.
Keep the momentum of your launch going after your big promotional push.
95% of other Kindle authors don't know or don't execute on these tactics, so you'll have a huge advantage and be able to win the top positions -- and the authority and income that come with it.
Ready to begin your journey to bestseller status? Let's get started!
target_audience: This course is for non-fiction Kindle authors who don't have a big established audience to sell to, but still want their book to have maximum impact, reach, exposure, and sales.
Fiction writers and those who already have legions of adoring fans are welcome, but won't get as much out of the material.

I'll see you in the classroom,
---Brian

Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance
MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.
MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.
MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.
MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


Assessment Description:


Product management and development are critical functions within any organization. They involve the creation, launch, and ongoing improvement of products and services to meet customer needs and drive revenue growth. As such, assessing an employee's proficiency in these areas is essential for companies to ensure that their product strategy is on track and aligned with their business goals.


A product management and development assessment can help companies identify skill gaps and areas of improvement for their employees, leading to better performance and increased productivity. By measuring an employee's understanding of market trends, customer needs, product development, and product launch strategies, companies can better equip their workforce to deliver products that meet customer demands and stay ahead of competitors.


For employees, a product management and development assessment is an opportunity to showcase their skills and knowledge in this critical area. It allows them to demonstrate their understanding of product strategy, market analysis, and development processes, which can lead to career advancement opportunities within their organization. As they gain experience in product management and development, employees can hone their skills and become valuable contributors to their company's success.


In addition to career advancement, product management and development topics are also useful for building a successful career. These skills are transferable across industries and can be leveraged to drive innovation, create new products, and launch successful startups. For individuals who are passionate about creating products that solve customer needs, a career in product management and development can be highly rewarding and fulfilling.


Overall, a product management and development assessment is a critical tool for companies and employees alike. It allows companies to evaluate their workforce's proficiency in this area, identify areas of improvement, and build a culture of product innovation. For employees, it is an opportunity to showcase their skills, advance their careers, and build a successful future in product management and development. By investing in product management and development assessment, companies can stay ahead of the competition and drive growth and innovation in the market.


Linked topics:
Assessment
Certification
Product Management & Development
Product Management
Product Development
Product manager
Product
product owner
product management certification
product design

courses.title: Shopier İle Deneyim Odaklı E-Ticaret Yapmaya Başlıyoruz! A-Z
courses.bio: Teknik bilgiye gerek yok! Shopier ile adım adım satış yapmayı öğren.
objectives: Shopier mağazasını sıfırdan açıp ürünleri profesyonelce listeleyebileceksin.
Sosyal medyada satışa yönlendiren içerikler üretip linkle sipariş alabileceksin.
Ürün açıklaması, fiyatlandırma ve kampanya oluşturmayı doğru şekilde uygulayabileceksin.
Tüm sipariş sürecini baştan sona sorunsuz ve müşteri odaklı şekilde yönetebileceksin.
Marka hikâyeni etkili anlatacak, Shopier mağazanı bir güven vitrini haline getirebileceksin.
requirements: Hiçbir teknik bilgiye sahip olman gerekmiyor.
Bilgisayar ya da telefon üzerinden internet erişimin olsun yeter.
Shopier ya da e-ticaret hakkında hiçbir deneyimin olmasa da öğrenebileceğin şekilde anlatıldı.
Sadece öğrenmeye açık olman, bu kursu tamamlaman için yeterli.
courses.description:
Shopier üzerinden satış yapmak isteyen herkes için hazırlanan bu kurs, herhangi bir teknik bilgiye ihtiyaç duymadan dijital mağazanı kolayca kurmanı ve etkin şekilde yönetmeni sağlar. Eğitim boyunca sıfırdan başlayarak; mağaza açılışı, ürün ekleme, fiyatlandırma, kampanya oluşturma, sipariş yönetimi ve müşteri iletişimi gibi tüm süreçleri adım adım, uygulamalı bir şekilde öğreneceksin.
Kurs süresince yalnızca platformun temel işleyişini değil, aynı zamanda sosyal medya üzerinden satış yapmanın püf noktalarını da keşfedeceksin. Instagram, TikTok ve diğer sosyal platformlardan mağazana trafik çekmeyi, takipçileri müşteriye dönüştürmeyi somut örneklerle göreceksin. Bu sadece bir teknik eğitim değil; dijital satış stratejileri kazanacağın bir rehber niteliğindedir.
Shopier’in altyapısal avantajlarını, diğer e-ticaret platformlarından farklarını ve sana nasıl zaman ve maliyet kazandırabileceğini net şekilde kavrayacaksın. Ayrıca, müşteri memnuniyetini artıracak iletişim tekniklerini ve sipariş sonrası süreç yönetimini de öğrenmiş olacaksın. Ödeme sistemleri, güvenlik önlemleri, kargo süreci ve kullanıcı deneyimi hakkında da birçok değerli bilgi seni bekliyor.

courses.description:
The product marketing role is notoriously tricky to pin down and define. The type of product you market, stage of growth your company's at, industry you're in, and so much more, can impact how you execute your role.
This fundamentals class brings clarity to the product marketing position to ensure you're fully up-to-speed with what's an exciting and multi-faceted role, that sits at the intersection of organizations large and small.
By the end, you'll walk away with a clear roadmap of the stages you need to nail to successfully get products to market - and keep them there, and a shorthand explanation of how to get the rest of your company to rally around your function.
Once you're enrolled, you'll gain access to 3 hours of:
Instructor-led presentations on everything from product marketing frameworks to the product manager and product marketing relationship
In-depth guest footage from product marketing experts from organizations like Lyft & TikTok
Industry-standard frameworks to guide your day-to-day and career progression
Discounts for continued professional PMM development & product marketing certification opportunities.


Who is this course for?
This course is for anyone who has an interest in or passion for product marketing. If you're looking to transition into the industry or are new to the role, it'll provide you with a solid understanding of not only what's expected of you, but what you can expect from product marketing.
Somewhat of a product marketing veteran? Not a problem. The product marketing landscape's constantly evolving and this fundamentals session is centered on only up-to-date info.
Struggling to get the rest of your org to understand what it is you do? Send them on this course. They'll walk away with an incredibly accurate overview of what it is you do, the impact you deliver, and how you can leverage each other's skillsets moving forwards.


Why pick Product Marketing Alliance?
We're home to the world's largest community of product marketers. By a long stretch.
Everything we do's centered on the very latest trends, practices and demands we see in our community, so you know you're only working off cutting-edge info.
Plus, with PMMs at orgs like Google, Microsoft, LinkedIn, Lyft and Adobe in our network, you know you're working off the very best, tried and tested formulas.

courses.description:
**Updated with new modules, descriptions and links**
Print On Demand Jewelry has been blowing up since I made this course and will continue to dominate thru 2024 and beyond. This niche of the market is not slowing down, if anything it's growing and getting bigger.
The future of ecommerce is branded dropshipping, or Print On Demand.
Online ecommerce sales are set to surpass 6.3 TRILLION dollars in 2024, and 2025 is going to be bigger than that.
Isn't it time you stepped up and took your slice of the pie?
You do not need any previous experience in Print On Demand Jewelry or ecommerce.
This course is suitable for anyone : from complete newbie and upwards.
I teach you how to do everything - if you have no experience whatsoever - no problem.
Anyone can copy my method(s) and start earning great money with Print On Demand jewelry.
Even if you have experience in this field, you will find my product reveal and ads methodology very helpful.
Forget drop shipping from China.
The company I use for Print On Demand jewelry is based in the US, manufactures in the US, and ships from the US.
Take payments from anywhere in the world - no need for your own credit card processor.
This course is a blueprint but requires hard work and dedication on your part.
Don't expect a get-rich-quick scheme. I am not selling you that.
A complete blueprint covering every single step
This course does not simply cover some of the things you need to do in order to succeed with Print On Demand jewelry. It covers everything from start to finish and assumes that you know nothing at all. Millions of dollars are being earned by people just like you, so why not step in and take your piece of the action? After completing this course you will be better informed than almost anyone out there doing Print On Demand jewelry. I've been working online for 30 years, and been doing ecommerce for the last 10. I've made well over 7 figures out of it, and have a lot of experience in this field.
$0 - $100k Facebook Ads Breakdown
Watch over my shoulder as I take you through every single one of my ads campaigns - going from 0 all the way up to 100k income from Print On Demand jewlery in just 12 short weeks. I break absolutely everything down, reveal my winning product design, then go through my Facebook Ads strategy in microscopic detail, month by month, week by week, day by day. I flip between my Ads Manager and Shopify store, matching up the numbers so you can see what's what and exactly how I did what I did to turn over 100k in income.
Course Content and Overview
Created for you if you are brand new to Print On Demand jewlery, or if you have tried it before and not been able to make money. The course contains 49 lectures (over 9.5 hours of content!) which are mainly over the shoulder demonstrations from my Facebook Business and Ads Managers, my Shopify store, my Print On Demand interface, and slideshow presentations to tie everything together. You also get some resources and links to web pages, sites I think you will find useful, access to my private Facebook group and over 80+ ready to go print on demand designs, many of which are in .psd format so you can edit yourself and turn them into even more products.
Section 1
We start with me explaining Print On Demand jewelry, the supplier I use and why I think they are the best Print On Demand jewelry company out there. I take you through their interface and how it works, before talking about where and how to get your own design(s) made, before uploading them to the platform and getting your products ready for promotion.
Section 2
Sections 2 and 3 of the course are all about Facebook Ads. Even if you know nothing about doing ad campaigns, please don't worry.
In section 2 I walk you through every single step you will need to get up and running. Creating a Facebook page and Instagram page are covered, along with opening a Facebook business manager account, adding an add account, then configuring your ads manager data columns and pixel correctly. All this is important 'ground work' as it were, before moving onto...
Section 3
We get in to the different types of Facebook ads you can make to promote you products. I cover in detail how to make these different types of Facebook ads including PPE (page post engagement), ABO (Adset Budget Optimization), CBO (Campaign Budget Optimization), Retargeting ads, and more.
Next I go over how to calculate your BEP ROAS (break even point return on adspend) depending on which products you would like to promote, and which countries you intend to sell them to. This is an all important metric you need in place, both on your computer and in your mind - before you start running any ads campaigns at all. Don't miss this lesson!
Finally I cover how to build custom audiences inside Facebook Ads, and then lookalike audiences, which are actually the key to my $100k method. Once you have the relevant data after a couple of weeks running ads, you can start spitting out multiple lookalike audiences which are tuned to both your product(s), and the audiences you are advertising them to. I walk you through every step of how to use these lookalike audiences in Facebook Ads, as well as covering my own exact ads strategy I used to earn $100k in 12 weeks.
Section 4
Product reveal! I show you the exact design I used for my Shine-On product, and the very Facebook image ad post that I am still using for promo on it now, over 12 months later. Current earnings for this one product just passed 203k. That's right : One Print On Demand jewelry product - 203k in sales, and counting.
By using lookalike audiences in Facebook Ads you can continue to push winning products for months and months. I show you exactly how to do this in my course, in minute detail, with over the shoulder lessons, screen recorded directly from my own computer.
I break down the 12 weeks that it took me to make 100k, and go through every single ads campaign that I used. I talk about winners, losers, ROAS, the lookalike audiences I used and how I built them... my entire ads structure is shown and broken down into the smallest detail. I talk through everything and leave nothing out. There are separate lessons for July, August and September. The lesson for August is an hour long in itself so you can see the amount of detail I go into.
Finally I go through a summary and conclusions from my 100k income over 12 weeks. I not only cover my successes but failures and mistakes too. I am trying to be as real as I can be here so wanted to include the bad as well as the good. You can see the mistakes I made and hopefully avoid them yourself.
Section 5
Section 5 contains a few essential update modules I made mid 2022, due to a Facebook Ads update, some iOS drama and needing a custom domain. At the time these were all important things so I considered it essential to let my students know what was going on.
Section 6
Just added March 13th, 2023 - I thought it only fair to add some more updates to this course at this point. It's 2 years since I first made it and Facebook Ads, plus the algorithm inside it, is always updating. Unlike other creators on Udemy or practically any other course platform online - I want to try and keep this course as up to date for my students as I can. This might not be possible forever but hey, while I'm here and around I'm certainly going to try. Please do watch these latest updates and if you have any questions at all you can of course get in touch with me via the course communication section and I'll do my best to help you.
Ready to get started? I'd love to have you as a student. Take action today and I'll see you inside the course.

courses.description:
Hello and welcome to my course, Book Marketing: Amazon Series Landing Page and Custom Domain.
No author website?  No author email?  No problem!
In this course, I'll teach you how to create an optimized Amazon author landing page with no extraneous BS.  Meaning: no expensive website and no time-consuming blog.  I'll then explain how to create a custom domain and forward it to your Amazon author landing page.
As an example, when you visit the custom URL for my wife's Miss Henry Mysteries series, you'll automatically be forwarded to the Amazon author landing page (in this case, an Amazon book series page) for the Miss Henry Mysteries series.
Note: Recently updated to include information on building a mobile-first, tree-structured author website using LinkPod.  This is particularly useful to authors with multiple series and books.
Q: How do you create the landing page?
A: By creating an Amazon Kindle eBook series page featuring all the books in a series or all the books by the author.  Author biography and Amazon Author Page augment this page.
An added benefit is that all books in a series are displayed on the Amazon book product page for each book in the series. You can't buy this kind of advertising — and it's free.
Q: How do you forward the URL to an Amazon series page?
A: By creating a simple forwarding record for the custom URL to forward it to the series page.
You can even forward emails directed to characters in the book series, common destinations such as your author name and "support" or "help" via the domain.
Q: How do you forward all these emails?
A: By creating simple forwarding records for all these emails to your email account (e.g. Gmail).
Why duplicate effort by creating an expensive and hard-to-maintain author website?  Instead, create a simple Amazon Kindle eBook series page based on your current book descriptions and containing Amazon customer ratings and buy buttons as a landing page.  Automatically include a list of all the books in the series on every Amazon book product description page for each book in the series.
Why write blog posts when you should instead be writing books?
Refer readers to a simple custom URL.  Provide domain email accounts for your book's characters.
Q: What is the #1 reason you should use an Amazon Kindle eBook series page as your landing page instead of an author website?
A: Potential readers can buy directly from the Amazon series page (which is updated as you publish more books).  In fact, Amazon goes so far as to offer the entire series for sale through a single mouse click.
This is simple.  This is short.  This is explained in depth and step-by-step in this course.
Q: What is the total cost of a forwarding domain?
A: About $9.42 for the first year.
Did that go a little too fast for you?  No worries, simply enroll in the course for a slow-paced, step-by-step walkthrough of the entry process.  Implement it at your pace.  Own it for your lifetime.
I'll see you in the classroom,
--Brian

courses.description:
** The MOST IN DEPTH AMAZON COURSE **
** After Successfully Teaching 20,000+ students How To Sell On Amazon on YouTube, Click2Online has decided to bring this Course to Udemy! **


Are you ready to take your career to the next level? In this course, you will learn everything you need to know about How To Sell On Amazon…. from Finding, Sourcing and Selling your First Product to Scaling to 6 & 7 Figures


This course covers all of the important topics that I have applied to Start my Business.
This course is taught by Experienced Amazon Seller Rushabh Buricha

8 years of E-commerce experience
Selling on Amazon since 2014
Sold more than 1,000 different products
Has consulted for 7 and 8 figure brands
The contents of this course are all based on my work experience selling over 1,000 products on amazon
Course Breakdown:
There are 14 core concepts that I will discuss when you're going through this course.


1. BE SUCCESSFUL - AMAZON SELLER


Hello guys, my name is Rushabh Buricha & I'm the founder of click2online, since the last few years we help sellers come online and grow their business.
It is very important in today's life to be online, especially for traditional businesses.
So in this course we will guide you step by step to how to grow your business on amazon.


2. GETTING STARTED - CREATING ACCOUNT - REGISTRATION PROCESS:


Creating an account: There are absolutely no charges to register on amazon, anyone can become amazon seller for free and the whole registration process takes 15-20 mins provided you have all the documents ready.
List of Documents : GST, Bank Details, Pan Card, Sign on a blank Paper.
GST no. is important to sell on amazon or any other marketplace, so if you don't have a GST, please apply for it and then continue with this course.
For the seller who has GST no. great… we are good to go.
A complete account setup session. This is for new sellers. Rest all the lectures are for both new and old sellers who are looking to grow their businesses.
3. SELLER DASHBOARD OVERVIEW:


After your account is created, your seller dashboard appears. This is the place you will operate as an amazon seller. All your business related data will be shown here. Few important things in the seller dashboard are account health, buy box, deals, coupons & ads manager.
Account Health: It is very important to keep your account health good. There are many things like late dispatch, negative reviews which affect your account health. Always keep your account health positive.
Buy Box: The term buy box means getting buy now option to your product. There are many criteria where amazon decides to give you a buy box or not. It is very important to have a buybox to get sales. All new sellers, you get your buybox quickly
Deals, Coupons & Ad manager: Promotion is important to bring sales. This all comes under promotion. All 3 things have their own pros and cons.


4. PRODUCT TO SELL


Deciding which product to sell on amazon:
Amazon deals with all categories and each category has some best products. All Categories have more sub categories. Every product belongs to the minimum 2 categories for amazon.
Amazon has millions of products. Some products get good sales and some don’t. The main point to keep in mind while being on Amazon is, the cheaper your products are, the more sales you get. Buyers come on amazon to get good products for less price. Even amazon advertises itself as buying good products for less price. So price point is important on amazon.
Secondly product images play an important role in a buyer's decision of purchasing your product.


5. AMAZON'S FEES


All categories have different commission percentages. With commission there are more fees amazon charges us on our product such as closing fees, shipping fees and many more. Amazon helps sellers to calculate all this commission and fees with its own amazon calculator.


6. CATEGORY & BRAND APPROVAL


So you have completed 4 chapters successfully and now it's time to hit the road i.e. listing your product. There are 2 types of product uploading: single listing and bulk listing. Before uploading products, sellers have to take category approval to sell in that particular category.
To take the category approval, you have to do the following steps:
(shown in the video)
After you get your category approval it's time for brand registration.
To do brand registration , follow the following steps:
(shown in the video)
Brand registration consists of GTIN exceptions.


7. LISTING YOUR PRODUCTS


Manual listing
Flat file listing
After listing is done, it's important to optimize it with the help of bullet points and description and perfect title. All these 3 things should consist of good keywords to get your product visibility.
for a new product to find good keywords for your product, go on amazon website and search for keywords related to your product.


8. ORDER RETURNS


Returns are very bad for online business and controlling them is equally important. If you get a good sale but you don't control the return, you won't be able to grow your business.
Reduction tips: to grow business, efforts are required from the seller also. For each order amazon provides customers phone no. with the order details, call each n every buyer to confirm his/her order and confirm address too. If you are selling any item which has a size i.e. shoes, clothing. Confirm that too in advance. The reason behind this is 50% returns are because of undelivered orders, so address confirmation can return that rate and 30-40% of returns are because of wrong size, which we can get control of.
Now talking about Safe-T Claim: Safe-t Claims helps you to get money for the product which in return gets damaged or the buyer sends you the wrong product. In damaged products amazon gives a claim up to 50% and in wrong products amazon gives 100%.


9. LOGISTICS


Final stage for order processing, that is shipment of the product. In this chapter we will teach you types of shipment available in amazon and which ones are good for online business.
After listing your product, you will start getting orders. The next step is shipment of your product. Amazon has 2 types of shipment.
1. EasyShip - Amazon shipment
2. SelfShip- Sellers shipment
In Easyship, all the orders will be picked up by amazon courier partner from your office or warehouse. And all your product will be shipped by amazon written on your product, which increases buyers trust. Amazon gives you both prepaid and COD orders.
In SelfShip, all the orders have to be delivered by you via your shipment sources or India post and you have to provide a valid tracking id to the product after shipment. Amazon gives you only prepaid orders
As a new seller, you have to decide between both and do the following process to select one of them. Shipment options can be changed later too.


10. CAMPAIGN MANAGER


Advertisements play an important role in growing online business, ads help your product to get visibility. It helps your product to come on the top of the search and it gets you to report about your product performance and what customers are searching when your product is displayed.


11. CAMPAIGN MANAGER - AUTOMATIC ADVERTISE


As a new seller, amazon gives you 2000 rs to spend on ads for free. In automatic ads, you give amazon some certain amount and amazon advertise by himself and try to give you sales. It is the easiest form of advertisement.


12. CAMPAIGN MANAGER - MANUAL ADVERTISE


As you do automatic ads, amazon gives you a report for the ad about where he has spent the daily amount. In the reports you get search terms, product targets which helps us to create a manual ad.
Manual ads are of 2 types: Keywords and product targeting.
From the report , we can create keywords targeting manual ads or product targeting manual ads.
There is even negative keyword targeting and negative keyword targeting . i'll show you how to make manual ads and how to use negative keywords and targeting
(shown in the video)
Advertising has ACoS, which is important to understand. Come to the next video and we will discuss ACoS.


13. ACOS (ADVERTISING COST OF SALE)


ASoC or known as Advertising cost of sale is measured as selling value product divided by ads cost. For example: your selling price is 1000 and ad cost is 100, then your ASoC is 10%. It is very important to keep ASoC in control, as ads cost comes under the profit margin, if ads cost goes up, your profit margin comes down. To keep ASoC maintained, keep track of your advertisement on a daily basis. Change ads accordingly. Any ad not performing well, pause it and make a new campaign. The less the ASoC, the more than the profit margin left for you.


14. BUSINESS REPORTS


Amazon shares with you each and every report relating to your account including sales report, payment report, seller commission reports, advertising reports. Reports help sellers to go through the business and change accordingly.


-In this course, I am not just teaching you the step by step guide how to succeed on Amazon, but I also teach fundamental frameworks, which are applicable across most e-commerce businesses. This enables you to think for yourself & not just follow a guide, which sets you up for success in the long term!

courses.description:
もしかして、あなたはTeachableを単なる会員サイトツールと勘違いしていませんか？
最近では日本でもTeachableを使ってコンテンツ提供をしている方を見かけるようになりましたが、その多くの方は「単なるコンテンツ提供ツール」として認識していないようです。
確かに、Wordpressは、簡易的な会員サイトを作ることはできても、コンテンツが複数になればそれぞれのオンラインコースのパスワード管理や顧客へのパスワード発行をメール配信システムを使って行わなくてはなりません。いまだに日本の多くのコンテンツマーケターは、ワードプレスでコンテンツを提供していますが、海外ではTeachableなどのマーケティング機能付きのサイトを使っている人がほとんどです。
具体的に、Teachableでできることを挙げると、、、
決済システム（一括、分割、定期課金と全ての決済オプションを選択可能）
会員管理（顧客の学習進捗をリアルタイムで確認できる）
メール配信（ステップメール的にメール配信することも可能）
ブログ機能
クーポンの発行（期限、枚数など限定性のあるクーポン発行が自由自在）
アップセル（ワンタイムオファー）機能で追加注文を受けることも可能
倍速での動画閲覧
学習進度を確認するクイズ機能
これらの機能がTeachableのサービスを利用することで使うことが可能になります。
しかし、繰り返しになりますが、Teachableは単なるコンテンツ提供ツールではありません。
申込みがあったら、すぐさまアップセルを仕掛けて売り上げを拡大させることも可能ですし、クーポン機能を使えば、期限付きのワンタイムオファーを仕掛けることが可能です。
コンテンツ提供だけでなく、完全なマーケティングオートメーションを組みたいのであれば、Teachableは必須のサービスです。
今までのように、Wordpressのコンテンツごとのパスワード管理や、動画コンテンツのURLリンクをイチイチYouTubeから引っ張ってきて貼り付けるような無駄なことに時間を割きたくないと考えている方は、さらにはコンテンツ提供だけでなくマーケティングツールとしてTeachableを使いこなしたい方は、ぜひこのコースでTeachableの基本的な使い方とマーケティング方法をマスターして自分のサービスに導入してみてください。
最後にこのコースの後半では実際にTeachableを使ってコース作成やセールスページ作成など実演ビデオも掲載しています。こちらをご覧になれば操作やマーケティングのイメージを持ちながら実践を進めることができます。
それでは、このコースの中でお会いしましょう。
target_audience: ご自身のオンラインコースを運営したいと考えている方
デザインや機能が優れている質の高い会員サイトを運営したい方

courses.description:
Welcome to course: Professional Diploma in Product Management by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance
MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.
MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.
MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.
MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.




Course Author:
Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.
In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.
In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.
Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.
With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


What is Product Management?
Product Management is a multifaceted discipline that encompasses the planning, development, marketing, and optimization of a product or service throughout its lifecycle. It involves aligning customer needs with business goals and coordinating cross-functional teams to deliver successful and valuable products. Product managers act as the linchpin between various departments, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.


Why is Learning Product Management Important for Companies and Experts?
Market Relevance and Competitiveness:
In an era of rapid technological advancements and evolving consumer preferences, companies must stay relevant. Product management equips professionals with the skills to identify market trends, understand customer needs, and develop products that outpace competitors
Customer-Centric Approach:
Successful products are those that solve real problems for customers. Product management emphasizes a customer-centric approach, ensuring that the product aligns with user needs and expectations. This focus enhances customer satisfaction and loyalty
Optimized Resource Allocation:
Product managers are adept at prioritizing features and functionalities based on business goals and customer needs. This strategic allocation of resources ensures that the most critical aspects of a product are addressed, maximizing the impact of limited resources
Effective Communication and Collaboration:
Product managers act as bridges between various departments, fostering effective communication and collaboration. This ensures that development, marketing, sales, and other teams work cohesively toward a common goal, reducing silos and enhancing overall efficiency
Adaptability and Innovation:
The product management discipline encourages a mindset of continuous improvement and innovation. Professionals in this field are equipped to adapt to changing market conditions, incorporate feedback, and drive iterative development, fostering a culture of innovation within the organization
How Knowledge of Product Management Aids Career Development:
Cross-Functional Skillset:
Product management requires a diverse skill set that includes market research, strategic planning, communication, and project management. Professionals with expertise in these areas are highly sought after, making product management a versatile career path
Leadership Opportunities:
Product managers often take on leadership roles, overseeing teams and guiding product development strategies. The ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive product success positions individuals for advancement in their careers
Entrepreneurial Mindset:
Product managers are often viewed as the "CEOs of their products." Learning product management instills an entrepreneurial mindset, empowering individuals to take ownership of their projects and make strategic decisions that impact the success of the product
Global Perspective:
As products have a global reach, product managers gain exposure to international markets and diverse customer bases. This global perspective enhances their ability to navigate the complexities of the modern business landscape
Product management is a critical discipline for companies aiming to thrive in today's dynamic markets. For professionals, mastering product management opens doors to leadership roles, cultivates an entrepreneurial mindset, and provides a comprehensive skill set that is invaluable in the ever-evolving business landscape.
target_audience: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Product Management or improve their knowledge.

courses.description:
Welcome to course "Customer Experience Management (CX): Frameworks & Strategies" by MTF Institute


In competitive landscape, exceptional Customer Experience (CX) isn't just a buzzword – it's the engine for growth, loyalty, and competitive advantage. But how do you move from theory to action?
We're thrilled to launch a comprehensive course designed to equip you with the essential knowledge and practical frameworks to truly understand, analyze, and optimize the entire customer journey.


This course, "Customer Experience Management (CX): Frameworks & Strategies", provides a solid foundation covering:


Fundamentals & Theory: Dive into core CX principles and high-level frameworks.
Practical Tools: Master techniques like Customer Journey Mapping, Empathy Mapping, and Service Blueprinting to visualize and design impactful experiences.
Understanding Your Customer: Learn effective Voice of the Customer (VoC) analysis, customer segmentation, and persona development.
Strategic Implementation: Explore service recovery, emotional design (EED), key metrics (LTV, CLV), and the vital link between Employee Experience (EX) and CX.
The Future of CX: Get an introduction to how Generative AI is transforming customer interactions, from personalized journeys to advanced conversational AI and smart recommendations.


This course is perfect for professionals in Marketing, Sales, Customer Service, Product Management, and Operations, as well as business owners and managers ready to elevate their customer interactions and drive sustainable success.
Through clear explanations and guided practical exercises, you'll gain the confidence to apply these concepts immediately in your role or business.
Ready to transform your customer experience and build lasting loyalty?
Enroll today and gain the frameworks and strategies you need!




Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance
MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.
MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.
MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.
MTF is present in 217 countries and has been chosen by more than 775 000 students.


Course Author:
Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.
In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses to a wide range of students from undergraduate level to business professionals and executives. Currently, as Head of the School of Business and Management at MTF, she leads the Product Development academic domain. At EIMT, where she also supervises doctoral students, Ms. Amoroso offers advanced instruction in research design and methodologies. Furthermore, she serves as a Research Consultant.
In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.
Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.
With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Course Description
In today's competitive landscape, exceptional Customer Experience (CX) is no longer a luxury – it's a necessity for business growth, customer loyalty, and competitive advantage. But how do you move beyond buzzwords to actually design and manage experiences that truly resonate with your customers?
This course, "Customer Experience Management (CX): Frameworks & Strategies", provides you with the essential knowledge and practical frameworks to understand, analyze, and optimize the customer journey.
You'll start by understanding the core theories and principles behind effective CX. We'll then dive into high-level CX frameworks and explore practical tools like Customer Journey Mapping, Empathy Mapping, and Service Blueprinting to visualize and understand customer interactions from their perspective and the operational view.
Learn how to effectively listen to your customers through Voice of the Customer (VoC) analysis and use techniques like customer segmentation and persona development to deeply understand different customer needs. The course also covers crucial strategies for handling service recovery and complaints, designing for emotional impact, and understanding key metrics like Lifetime Value (LTV) and Customer Lifetime Value (CLV). We even touch upon the vital link between employee experience (EX) and CX.
Through clear explanations and references to practical exercises, you'll gain a solid foundation to start applying CX concepts in your own role or business. This course is designed for professionals in marketing, sales, customer service, product management, and operations, as well as business owners and managers, who want to elevate their customer interactions and drive sustainable success.
Enroll today to gain the frameworks and strategies needed to transform your customer experience and build lasting loyalty!
target_audience: Professionals in Marketing, Sales, Customer Service, Product Management, and Operations roles.
Business owners, team leaders, and managers seeking to improve customer satisfaction & loyalty.
Professionals looking to build practical skills in Customer Experience Management (CX).
Anyone interested in understanding, mapping, and optimizing the customer journey.

そして月額制の「聴き放題プラン」による圧倒的なリーチ力は
あなたのコンテンツがまだ出会っていない未来のファンに発見される大きなチャンスを秘めています。

すでにAmazonのAudibleで出版されている方にとっても、audiobook. jpは異なる顧客層にアプローチできるため、販路を拡大し、収益源を多角化する上で欠かせない、次なる戦略の要となるプラットフォームです。

といった不安から、行動に移せずにいるクリエイターは少なくありません。

でも、ご安心ください。
本講座は、そんなあなたのための「完全攻略マニュアル」です。
