courses.description:
Learn How to Start an Etsy T-Shirt Business in 2019 with No Costs!


Check out our latest January 2020 course!


Take your Etsy Store to the next level with EtsyCentral's 2019 advanced course on how to start your very own Etsy t-shirt business
EtsyCentral is a thinkTank comprised up of the best sellers, crafters, artists, hustlers, and makers to ever sell on Etsy. As a collective, they have generated over $15 million dollars worth of sales to date. The knowledge and taught in this latest course took years to discover and develop. As a group, its our deepest mission to spread freedom to those who don't want to live the normal 9-5.
----------------------
Hi there!
My name is Jackie and I am one of the instructors for this course. Etsy and EtsyCentral has given me the ability to live a life of freedom and sustainability all while doing exactly what I love...crafting. Etsy allowed me, a young woman to chase my lifelong dream of opening my own business. With it, I have traveled the world, met with amazing, inspirational people, and built a life I've only ever dreamed of living.
It's hard for me to even begin to explain all of the amazing things that Etsy has made possible for me. I want to share that with ANYONE who wants to learn. I want to share with you every tactic and strategy I've learned along the way to growing and scaling out my own Etsy Store. I'll show you how to add scarcity "only 3 items left..." to all of your listings, I'll teach you how to grow your reviews more than you've ever thought possible, I'll teach you how to send monthly emails to your entire customer base automatically. Most of all, I want to help makers grow their Etsy business so that they can focus on their passions.
Yours Truly,
Jackie
-------
By the end of this course, you will be fluently versed in the art of selling on Etsy and be ready to make your own sales grow with the strategies we cover.
Sign up today, and look forwards to:
Over 390 minutes of HD 1080p animated video content covering everything you'll ever need to know to succeed as an Etsy Seller
How to setup a Print on Demand T-shirt business that will generate you sales without having to hold inventory or make purchases in advance
Building out your own automated year long follow up email funnel that includes request for honest reviews, and promises of outstanding customer service.
Bid Strategy, Google Ads, and External Scaling Strategies
Learn how to spy on your competitors and target their keywords
A catalogue of outstanding customer service responses
Our SEO ready 2019 Etsy product description template
$8000+ Etsy SEO bootcamp course materials and curriculum
From 1 Sale to Etsy Guru with Just One Course
-------
How To Sell On Etsy
In this course students will learn how to take their Etsy stores to the next level. The course is broken up into 5 modules covering the major categories of selling on Etsy.


Module 1 will introduce you to Etsy Central and how to get the most out of this course


Module 2 will go over with you how to setup your store on Etsy and is titled "Setting Up Your Store"


Module 3 is called, "Branding 101" and goes over the essentials of branding and how to communicate your stores message and quality standards to your customers. In this section we go over how The North Face, Patagonia, etc. are able to connect with their customers on a deeper level. We'll even create our very own logo from start to finish


Module 4 is called, "What the Heck is Print on Demand" and goes what the heck is Print on Demand. In this section we will go over a few different Print on Demand backends that will allow you to create and list designs and them fulfill them as customers order them...automatically!


Module 5 titled, "Conceptualizing, Designing, Listing on Etsy" goes over the process of designing and listing products onto your Print on Demand backend and then onto Etsy. In this module we go over from start to finish, designing, listing and selling your first Print on Demand product!


Module 6 titled, "Yay! First Order... Now What?"  continues the previous module and goes over what to do when you get your first order. How do you fulfill? How do you ship?


Module 7 is called, "The Etsy Search Engine Algorithm and How to Hack It" and goes over the essentials of Etsy's search engine algorithm and how to work with it to boost sales. We will go over how to leverage keywords and spy on our competitors to optimize our listings for success


Module 8 is titled, "Optimizing Your Listings for Maximum Conversion" and goes over how to turn your now keyworded listing into a profitable value proposition. In this section you will learn how to add keywords into your listing to MAXIMIZE placement and rankings for your products, how to optimize your Etsy descriptions to better engage potential customers, how to take and incorporate engaging photos that WOW your audience, how to keep customers happy by giving them excellent customer service, how to ask for and obtain reviews, and how to align your interests with Etsy’s interest to gain their favor! By this end of this module, you will know how to fully optimize your listing for maximum engagement!


Module 9 goes over how to use Etsy's native ads program to quickly ramp up your keyword ranking efforts and is called, "Module 3 : Scaling your store with Etsy’s Promoted Listings"


Module 10 is named, "Scaling your store with a few emails" and goes over how to use Aweber to link your customer emails up to your marketing email funnel. This section focuses on how to establish a meaningful connection with your fanbase. Included in this lesson are my individual email templates I used to 10x my return customers!


Module 11 is called, "Driving sales with external traffic" and goes over how to bring external traffic from outside Etsy into Etsy by purchasing something from your storefront.


Module 13 is called "Applying the Lessons... Scaling for Print on Demand" and goes over with you how to apply the lessons we learned in the previous modules with the specific needs of a Print on Demand store.
I've also included a bonus lecture on the Scarcity Hack I used to beat out all my competitors on the search page


In addition to all of our lessons, we've included sections on gathering Etsy reviews, how to scale new products, how to grow your storefront into a profitable, sustainable business. Additionally we have also included all of our email and customer service response templates!

courses.description:
Are you looking to establish HIGHLY EFFECTIVE and EFFICIENT campaigns on Amazon Advertising? Then look no further than this comprehensive course, created by Best-Selling Udemy course instructor and author, Romney Nelson.
If you're new to Amazon Advertising, this course will be perfect for you. It covers all the essential steps to establish campaigns and achieve results. If you're struggling to manage your Ad spend and not achieving the results you need, this course will provide you with the strategies to optimize your campaigns and lower your ACOS.
With over 350 books published in the US, UK, Canada, and Australia, Romney has developed this course by combining all of his knowledge, lessons, and skills into an actionable course that delivers results. He has spent thousands of dollars and hours over the past three years, learning from critical mistakes that he has now overcome to successfully advertise his books across various international Amazon marketplaces, optimize his keywords, and significantly reduce his Ad spend while driving up sales.
In this course, you will learn everything from the mindset of Amazon Advertising, keyword research, establishing auto, broad, phrase and exact keyword campaigns, ASIN and Category campaigns, optimization of campaigns, and broadening your advertising to other international markets.
Don't miss out on this opportunity to learn from a seasoned expert who has made the initial costly and stressful mistakes, so you don't have to! Check out the introductory lesson and then get started today!


REVIEWS (Overall Course rating of 4.9/5)
★★★★★
Romney is an amazing Instructor. I have been following him and his KDP methods for years now. Highly recommend if you are wanting to do advertising with Amazon Ads. Leon James
★★★★★
I'm brand new to Amazon Advertising so this course was perfect for me! It was very easy to follow and understand! My only suggestion would be to have a full course transcript to refer back to instead of having to scroll through the videos to find the specific information you may have forgotten. Thanks so much for creating this course! :) Jennifer Spivey

Do you wish you had your own personal AI assistant that could help you with your daily work, writing emails, creating landing pages, building campaigns, and more?
In this hands-on course, you’ll learn exactly how to build that assistant using ChatGPT.
You'll create a custom GPT that knows your business, understands your audience, and writes in your voice. Once you’ve built it, you’ll wonder how you ever got along without it.
This course is for professionals who want to get things done with AI. We skip the hype, history, and theory, and dive straight into building your own AI tool. Whether you're a marketer, founder, operator, or AI enthusiast, you'll walk away with a practical system you can use immediately.
Here’s what we’ll do together:
Teach ChatGPT the specifics of your business and product
Customize your GPT with your messaging, voice, and personas
Generate real go-to-market content like:
Landing pages
Email sequences
Ad copy
Campaign briefs

Downloadable Materials
Everything we use in the course is yours to keep. You’ll get:
All prompts and templates in downloadable formats

MTF is present in 215 countries and has been chosen by more than 684 000 students.


M1-Project, developer of Elsa AI Marketing Assistant
In fast-paced digital world, businesses need to stay ahead of the curve. One way to achieve this is by leveraging AI marketing tools. These tools, such as an AI marketing assistant from M1-Project, help companies streamline their marketing strategies, making them more effective and efficient. But what exactly is an AI marketing assistant?
An AI marketing assistant is a powerful tool that utilizes artificial intelligence to automate and optimize various marketing tasks. From analyzing data to personalizing customer interactions, this digital helper can do it all. By integrating an AI assistant into your workflow, you can focus on more strategic tasks while leaving the repetitive work to the machine. Whether you’re a small startup or a large corporation, AI marketing solutions can adapt to your specific needs, making it an essential part of any modern marketing strategy.

Product Marketing for Startups: Identify Your Audience & Attract Customers with AI

Course Description
AI-powered product marketing and market research leverages artificial intelligence to automate, enhance, and optimize various aspects of understanding and reaching target customers. This includes tasks like:
Identifying ideal customer profiles (ICPs): AI can analyze vast datasets to identify patterns and predict which customer segments are most likely to convert.
Crafting compelling messaging: AI can help tailor messaging to specific customer segments and personalize content for better engagement.
Automating content creation: AI can generate various types of marketing content, from ad copy and social media posts to blog articles and email newsletters.
Optimizing marketing campaigns: AI can analyze campaign performance in real-time and make data-driven adjustments to improve ROI.
Conducting market research: AI can analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer sentiment to provide valuable insights.


Importance for Companies:
Improved efficiency and productivity: AI automates repetitive tasks, freeing up marketers to focus on strategic initiatives.
Enhanced customer understanding: AI provides deeper insights into customer behavior, preferences, and needs.

courses.title: Finance for Micro-Renewable Energy
courses.bio: How to financially assess micro-renewable energy systems
objectives: assess a micro-renewable energy project by comparing with other forms of investment
compare Capital Investments with long-term benefits and no liability
use better methods of using financial metrics to sell micro-renewable energy
understand why payback times don't work and why the industry needs to stop using them

Introduction: Interactive Learning - Practise your new skills
Lecture 5 - how to determine energy price rate rises

requirements: Basic maths skills and spreadsheet formulas and functions. You will need Powerpoint or Pdf reader
e.g.  you should be able to use EXCEL
e.g you will need to understand how to add percentage rate rises
You don't even have to be interested in Micro-Renewable energy. This course gives you a means to analyses ANY INVESTMENT
courses.description:
This course is for businesses and domestic customers who wish to learn how to assess if a particular product is worthwhile investing in or how to sell their renewable energy in a better way.
Selling a product is about emotion but it shouldn’t be! It should be about gain, profit and benefits to the customer. Payback times don’t do that. They mask the truth. We’re here to dispel the myths and help you see the truth.
It is probably best to do this course after you've completed the first one on Micro-Renewable Energy for Beginners. However, this is not a must, because this course in a way could apply to ANY FORM OF INVESTMENT. It's just that I've applied these techniques to this topic!

This course will teach you how to financially assess any form of micro-renewable energy or investment using techniques derived from capital budgeting and investment. Typically, these techniques are used in the stock market.

Using these techniques, you will build upon the knowledge you gained from the first course. This will allow you to work out if a particular micro-renewable energy system is financially worthwhile, quickly and efficiently. You won't need to learn how to calculate payback times, which are a pointless metric that much of the industry still uses.

If you want to get the full information on micro-renewable energy this is a definite follow up course you should do.
target_audience: Homeowner
Business owners
Salesmen

反応が取れるタイトルテンプレート

終わりに: パッケージで手に取らせ、中身でファン化させる

requirements: 特になし。必要なことは全て本講座で学習できます。
courses.description:
商品を作ってみたけど、全然売れない。
そんなお悩みはありませんか？


売れる商品を作るためには「コンセプト」が大事です。
良いコンセプトがあれば、商品は自然に売れていきます。
無理なセールスをせずとも、値引きせずとも、勝手に売れます。
これほど嬉しいことはありませんよね。


たとえば、ダイソンの掃除機のコンセプトは「吸引力の変わらない、ただひとつの掃除機」です。
コードレスでありながら高い吸引力を誇ります。
そして、値段設定が高めですが、世界中で人気の商品です。
なぜ、ダイソンがこんなにも売れていくのかと言えば、やはりコンセプトで勝っているからです。
他の掃除機との違いが一目瞭然。
ゆえに、商品価格が少々高くても買われていきます。


そう、良いコンセプトがあれば、値段は関係ありません。
コンセプトが良ければ、値段が高くても売れるのです。


でも反対に、コンセプトが悪ければ、たとえ値段が安くても売れません。
しかも、どれだけ商品内容が素晴らしかったとしても、売れることはありません。
なぜなら、お客様は商品を中身で判断せず、パッケージや外見を確認して、買うかどうかを決めるからです。
つまり、コンセプトを見て、購買するか否かを決定しています。


良いコンセプトがあれば売れる。
悪いコンセプトであれば売れない。
シンプルですね。


では、良いコンセプトはどうやって作るのでしょうか？
その答えをこのオンライン講座で解説します。
本講座では、年７億円を売る現役WEBマーケターが、現場でうんうん唸りながら格闘して生み出した「コンセプト作り」のノウハウについてあなたにシェアします。きっとあなたのお役に立てると思います。
ぜひ、最後まで受講して『１撃で見込み客を魅了するコンセプト作り方』を身につけてください。
それでは、始めましょう。
target_audience: コンテンツビジネスを実践している方
高額商品を販売したい個人起業家
売上UPを狙いたい人
オンライン講座を制作している方

courses.description:
لتتمكن من انشاء محتوى اعلاني مقنع ( فيديوهات اعلانية ناجحة، صفحات هبوط قوية، ووصف منتوج مقنع...) يجب عليك قبل كل شيء دراسة السوق باكمله
:لدراسة السوق وفهمه من كل الجوانب يجب عليك
دراسة منتجك وفهمه اكثر من اي شخص اخر. لانك اذا لم تفهم منتجك من الداخل والخارج لن تتمكن من اقناع جمهورك بمنتجك ولن تتمكن من شرح المنتج وايصال فكرته بطريقة صحيحة
في هذا الدرس سوف اشارك معك خطوة بخطوة العناصر والمعلومات الضرورية  التي يجب عليك جمعها ومعرفتها حول منتجك + المواقع التي ستساعدك في جمع هذه المعلومات + لائحة الاسئلة التي يجب عليك طرحها حول منتجك والاجابة عليها بالطريقة التي ساشارك معك
دراسة منافسيك وفهمهم اكثر من انفسهم: فهم منافسيك من الضروريات لكي تستطيع معرفة نقط قوتهم ونقط ضعفهم لكي تستطيع التميز عليهم من ناحية العروض والتسويق وتستطيع ايضا سرقة جمهورهم وبيع منتجك بكثرة
في هذا الدرس ساشارك معك الطريقة الصحيحة التي ستمكنك من فهم منافسيك وجمع كل المعلومات الضرورية حولهم لكي تتمكن من التميز عليهم + المواقع التي  ستجد فيها كل اعلانات منافسيك وصفحات هبوطهم  ونوع المعلومات التي يجب عليك التركيز عليها وجمعها + لائحة الاسئلة التي يجب عليك الاجابة عليها حول منافسيك لكي تستطيع اختيار استراتيجة التسويق المناسبة لك
دراسة الجمهور: لن تستطيع اقناع جمهورك بمنتجك ان لم تدرسهم وتفهمهم اكثر من انفسهم.

objectives: Master Canva for Professional Ebook Covers: Learn the ins and outs of Canva to design unique, eye-catching covers that stand out in the market.

courses.description:
In today's competitive publishing world, having a stunning ebook cover can make all the difference. Welcome to "Canva & Leonardo AI Phoenix - Ebook Cover Design Mastery," a comprehensive course designed to equip you with the skills to create eye-catching, professional ebook covers in two powerful ways.


Master the Art of Ebook Cover Design


Whether you’re an aspiring author, a seasoned writer, or a freelancer looking to expand your services, this course offers invaluable insights and hands-on experience:


The Traditional Way with Canva: Dive into the world of manual design using Canva. Learn the foundational principles of design, color theory, typography, and layout to craft unique and personalized ebook covers. This tried-and-true method provides you with the creative freedom to bring your vision to life.
The Cutting-Edge Way with Leonardo AI Phoenix: Step into the future of design with Leonardo AI’s latest Phoenix model. This revolutionary tool allows you to generate stunning ebook covers in a flash, using advanced AI technology that is levels ahead of traditional design methods. Imagine creating covers for any genre, theme, or concept you can think of – all with the click of a button.


Why This Skill is Invaluable


High Demand: Authors and publishers are constantly on the lookout for eye-catching covers to boost their book sales. Your new skills can position you as a top-tier designer in a lucrative market.
Freelance Opportunities: Platforms like Fiverr, Upwork, and Freelancer are bustling with clients ready to pay a premium for professional ebook cover designs. Become a highly sought-after freelancer by mastering these techniques.
Personal Projects: If you're an author or entrepreneur, these skills will enable you to create compelling covers for your own books, enhancing your brand and increasing sales.


Be an Early Adopter


Don't miss out on the chance to become an early adopter of this groundbreaking technology. As AI continues to evolve, those who harness its power now will have a significant advantage in the marketplace. Overcome any fear of new technology and embrace the ease and efficiency that Leonardo AI Phoenix offers.


Course Highlights


Step-by-Step Tutorials: Detailed, easy-to-follow instructions for both Canva and Leonardo AI Phoenix.
Real-World Examples: Practical projects that simulate actual client requests.
Expert Tips: Insider knowledge from industry professionals on how to make your designs stand out.


Invest in Your Future


By enrolling in this course, you’re not just learning a skill – you’re investing in your future. Ebook cover design is a valuable asset in today's digital age, and with the right tools and techniques, you can transform your creative passion into a profitable venture.


Sign up today and start your journey towards mastering ebook cover design with Canva & Leonardo AI Phoenix. Your future as a sought-after designer begins here.

courses.title: 4五大歐美電商市場調查工具與方法論: 競品、賣家、產品、價格、趨勢分析-傳統貿易也適用
courses.bio: 出口與跨境電商必備市調工具與技能，快速分析歐美亞馬遜、eBay、Wish、英、美、澳、德市場主要競爭產品與賣家，找到成功行銷策略
objectives: 歐美市場調查方法與免費電商調查工具

課程介紹: 如何做海外市場調查? 基本概念與工具準備
全球產品與供貨分析神器: 亞馬遜、eBay、蝦皮，穿梭各國多平台，鳥瞰市場的超強工具
亞馬遜麒麟分析器:: 競爭者排排站，看誰賣的最好，暢銷產品之銷售量，賣家排行，業績一覽，利潤，物流狀況，刊登表現評分，市場評價數
歐美暢銷爆品看板Best Sellers: 去暢銷排行找靈感，發現歐美爆品，一目了然銷售量與網友評價，被關注的次數
示範爆品開發:歐美爆品看板+亞馬遜麒麟分析+中國大陸1688批發網找貨源
亞馬遜價格追蹤器:知道各產品的歷史價格並可追蹤，讓你競爭分析，精準定價，洞察產品趨勢，或是可買到低價
Google Trend 商機趨勢:用關鍵字查出世界各國的需求趨勢，是成長，穩定還是衰退

requirements: 會使用Chrome瀏覽器
註冊好淘寶、天貓、1688或阿里巴巴任一個帳號
courses.description:
本課程教你海外市場調查的方法，並指導採用五個強大的免費分析工具，讓你用數據找到潛力商品，不再靠感覺與碰運氣做事情。五個工具如下:
工具1【全球產品與供貨分析神器】: 快速穿梭亞馬遜、eBay、蝦皮，分析各國，各平台商機，分析歐美、台灣與東南亞市場產品、賣家、銷售量，以及「採購來源」與利潤
工具2【亞馬遜麒麟分析器】: 亞馬遜搜尋頁面上的所有暢銷產品之銷售量，賣家排行，業績一覽，利潤，物流狀況，刊登表現評分，市場評價數
工具3【歐美暢銷爆品看板】: 當你不知道該賣什麼，創意枯竭時，就去亞馬遜與eBay賣場暢銷排行找靈感發現歐美爆品，一目了然銷售量與網友評價，被關注的次數
工具4【亞馬遜價格追蹤器】:知道各產品的歷史價格並可追蹤，讓你競爭分析，精準定價，洞察產品趨勢，或是可買到低價
工具5【Google Trend 商機趨勢】:用關鍵字查出世界各國的需求趨勢，是成長，穩定還是衰退
所有商業的起點是 從“找到好產品”開始。如果你的產品不好吃，最好不要花錢找一大堆人來試吃，先關起門來研發出好吃的東西再說。市場上過半電商的課程都跟「流量開發」有關，卻很少課程去研究開發產品與市場研究，企業最好能先確認自己的產品與網站設計都夠具有競爭力，才不至於變成花錢找人來試吃不夠好吃的東西，拿石頭打自己的腳!
亞馬遜是在歐美日澳印度等國家都是龍頭，研究亞馬遜就幾乎等於研究了世界市場，對於台灣許多代工轉品牌、出口貿易商而言，就算不作電商，也必須利用市場調查工具去研究消費者需求、競爭者，商品價格，銷售量與趨勢等。如果代工商不懂得做這些研究，要如何懂當地消費者，跳過品牌商與通路商，打入海外市場?又如何夢想轉型? 過去必須靠線下的工具去做市場研究，花大量時間金錢又難以準確，現在透過網路，快速、廉價且相對精準。【線上市場調查，就是未來的趨勢，也是企畫人員必備的技能】
target_audience: 海外行銷人員
跨境電商業者
代工出口廠商

courses.description:
But de la formation
Trouver le bon produit gagnant. Le but de cette formation est de trouver le produit GAGNANT, c’est à dire celui qui crée le plus d’interactions auprès de l’audience choisie.
Description :
ClickFunnels est un logiciel en ligne très puissant proposant de nombreux outils pour optimiser ses ventes sur Internet. Son utilisation est simple mais les bénéfices qu’il est possible d’en tirer sont très importants.
Dans cette formation j’utilise ClickFunnels pour trouver le plus rapidement possible UN produit gagnant.
La formation se déroule en 5 grandes étapes.
La première est de mettre en place un système combinant 3 tunnels de vente. En suivant mon plan d’action, cette étape est relativement simple et ne vous demandera pas beaucoup de temps. Dans cette première phase, le but est de monter votre système de test afin de déterminer un produit gagnant. Pour cela, vous utiliserez mon nouveau tunnel de vente que je partage avec vous au sein de la formation.
La deuxième étape concerne la sélection d’une audience de base. Je vous présente une stratégie très simple et rapide pour éviter de perdre du temps dans cette sélection. C’est fini les heures de recherches parce que la page Facebook que vous souhaitez cibler n’apparaît pas dans Audience Insights !
La troisième étape est la recherche de contenu pour vos publicités Facebook. Ici, je vous propose une approche basée sur un format de publicité unique qui est la vidéo. Grâce à un outil très efficace, vous ferez vos vidéos de ventes en un clin d’oeil. Et cela même si vous n’avez jamais fait de montage vidéo ;)
Le but du jeu est d’obtenir un maximum de trafic vers vos tunnels de vente. Je vous montre comment arriver à vos fins avec des vidéos qui donnent envie de cliquer sur vos publicités.
A titre d’exemple, vous verrez au travers des vidéos, comment j’obtiens plus de 230 clics sur le lien de ma publicité avec environ 16€ de budget, soit environ 7 centimes par clic.
La quatrième étape est la mise en place de vos publicités et leur lancement. En suivant ma stratégie, vous pourrez analyser vos futurs résultats très facilement.
La cinquième étape est l’analyse de vos résultats, l’optimisation et la sélection du produit Gagnant.
Je filme intégralement mon écran à chaque étape. Il ne vous reste plus qu’à COPIER COLLER et obtenir vos premiers résultats dans 5 jours.
Prêt à vous lancer ?
Il vous suffit de cliquer sur le bouton "Acheter maintenant" et je vous retrouve dans la première vidéo. Je vous attends !
target_audience: Vous êtes complètement PERDU avec ClickFunnels
Vous voulez ENFIN ne plus perdre de temps
Vous voulez une METHODE redoutable pour trouver les produits gagnants
Vous voulez une formation ETAPE PAR ETAPE et facile à suivre

courses.description:
产品经理（Product manager，PM）主要是负责针对某一项或是某一类的产品进行规划和管理，负责产品的研发、制造、营销、渠道等工作。产品经理是很难定义的一个角色，如果非要一句话定义，那么产品经理是为终端用户服务，负责产品整个生命周期的人。
产品经理课程是一门专注于培养学生成为优秀产品经理的课程。本课程通过四个主要模块，即走进产品经理、市场与竞品的分析、需求的管理、产品逻辑拆解，全面介绍了产品经理的工作职责和技能要求。通过本课程的学习，你可以了解产品经理的角色和职责，培养你的市场分析和竞品研究能力、产品逻辑思维和问题解决能力，掌握产品规划，增强你在产品管理领域的竞争力。

courses.description:
Course Introduction
This course is based on the core of TikTok's e-commerce operations, and is designed around key links such as market analysis, team building, advertising, and fund management. It combines the latest industry trends and practical experience to provide students with a full-link capability improvement plan.
Course Framework and Core Highlights:
Chapter 1: Analysis of New Market Opportunities and Pitfalls for TikTok E-commerce
Combined with user portraits and consumption habits in emerging markets such as the United States, analyze the impact of cultural differences on product selection, and through various popular category cases, dismantle how to avoid policy compliance, market and other risks. Guide students to evaluate the feasibility of market entry.
Chapter 2: Evaluation of the Adaptability of TikTok Newcomers in the US Market
Analyze the entry opportunities for novices based on the actual situation of low customer unit price and high premium brands in terms of traffic, competition, conversion, etc. in the US market. Provide a guide to avoid pitfalls in the US. Provide professional analysis for the US market that students are most concerned about.
Chapter 3: Core Steps for Quickly Building a TikTok E-commerce Team
Refine the job responsibility model (such as content creation, investment optimization, customer service management), and introduce an agile team management framework, covering KPI setting and cross-departmental collaboration process design. Analyze how the head team can achieve a million GMV per month at a low cost.
Chapter 4: TikTok Advertising Strategy and Techniques
In-depth explanation of TikTok Shop advertising optimization techniques, combined with A/B testing tools to improve material click-through rate; disassemble the challenge + information flow advertising combination to achieve a closed loop of traffic. Emphasize that TikTok advertising is a key channel for obtaining traffic
Chapter 5: TikTok e-commerce project 0-1 startup guide
Disassemble the entire process from product selection database construction to cold start traffic pool construction, covering independent station and TikTok Shop dual-path operation strategies. Including risk control: adding relevant core content such as inventory cycle calculation model and logistics channel selection criteria.
Chapter 6: Team funding allocation and incentive mechanism
Design equity allocation + performance bonus combination incentive plan, analyze the funding priority division of the start-up and mature stages, such as advertising budget proportion and team training investment. Point out that team incentives are the key to sustainable development. Reduce staff turnover through profit sharing system, improve team efficiency and profitability.
Chapter 7: Aesthetic selection account operation methodology
Combined with visual preferences and platform algorithm logic, disassemble the script structure of high-interaction videos (such as "product pain points + different scenarios"). And use some techniques, tools, etc. to quickly improve the quality of content.
Teaching mode and resource integration
Practical sandbox drill: The instructor has grouped practical accounts for operation, from product selection to full-process operation, etc.
Industry resources involved: involving TikTok official service providers, overseas warehousing partners, available copyright music libraries, etc.
Advanced tools involved: involving TikTok Creative Center, third-party product selection tools, advertising attribution models, etc.
Course differentiation advantages
Summary perspective content design: taking into account the operational differences between brand sellers and supply chain sellers, explaining practical customization strategies.
In-depth interpretation of policy compliance: taking into account the involvement of intellectual property, taxation, companies, etc. in the European and American markets.
Through the introduction, the theoretical depth and practical granularity of the course are explained to help students build a complete TikTok e-commerce operation system framework concept.
target_audience: Everyone interested in TIKTOK e-commerce

courses.description:
To B产品要做好规划，找准要切入的行业和市场，不能单纯依赖产品经理的直觉和领导“拍脑袋”，而是要通过可靠的商业化分析，逐步论证，为接下来的资源投入和产品设计提供方向。
本次课程，我们邀请到拥有16年B端产品经验，曾负责过多个B端产品从0到1的规划、设计和落地执行，擅长从商业视角对产品进行精准定位的高亮老师，教你从行业、市场到目标客户，逐步论证to B产品的商业化机会。
课程分为5个部分：
第一部分围绕to B产品的行业与市场分析，教你如何产出一份高质量的行业市场分析报告；
第二部分通过介绍商业模式画布的运用，讲解toB产品如何通过分析商业模式破局；
第三部分围绕to B产品的竞品分析，帮你搞清楚在确定了要进入的行业和市场后，该如何确定自己是否有竞争力；
第四部分讲解目标客户的分析，从四个维度对目标客户进行分析，寻找商业突破口；
第五部分介绍了to B产品可行性验证与定价的方法，避免产品因为缺乏对成本和收入的考量而走向失败。
希望通过本课程，能够提升to B产品经理的商业思维，掌握扎扎实实做好toB产品前期的分析和规划，提升产品的成功率。
target_audience: 3-5年to B产品经理：掌握行业、市场、竞品和客户分析的方法，更加快速准确的发现市场，提升商业思维

courses.title: Crack the Code of Flexible Packaging – Tools, Costs & Growth
courses.bio: Flexible Packaging Secrets – Boost Profits with Smarter Materials & Costs
objectives: Understand the fundamentals of flexible packaging — including material types, structures, and industry-specific applications across food, chemical, and export s
Choose the right packaging materials for different product types using real-world criteria like shelf life, barrier performance, and cost-efficiency.
Identify and solve common packaging problems such as poor sealing, printing defects, or freshness loss — using smart, field-tested solutions.
Calculate and optimize packaging costs using practical tools like the Rotogravure Cost Model and learn how small adjustments impact pricing.
Work effectively with local and international suppliers by asking the right technical and commercial questions to ensure consistent quality and delivery.
Leverage digital tools and automation in packaging decisions — including online estimators and problem finders that reduce guesswork and improve speed.
Apply packaging strategies to support business growth — with tips on supplier relationships, cost reduction, export compliance, and quality assurance.

1. What is Flexible Packaging? Understan: 1. What is Flexible Packaging? Understand the types, structure & application
. Packaging Cost Deep Dive-Advanced Mate: Packaging Cost Deep Dive-Advanced Material Selection
Use calculators, estimators & automation for faster results
A step-by-step guide to choosing the right packaging
Before You Buy Flexible Packaging: Before You Buy Flexible Packaging_ 7 Advices
Why Packaging Is Product Development’s Secret
Pricing of rotogravure packaging: Pricing of rotogravure packaging Cost Model

requirements: No prior packaging experience is required — this course is designed to be beginner-friendly yet rich in professional insights.
courses.description:
This course is designed for professionals working in packaging, marketing, product development, or procurement who want to understand flexible packaging from a practical, decision-making perspective. It’s built around real tools, real examples, and industry experience — not academic theory.
You’ll learn how to choose the right materials, understand cost drivers, and avoid common packaging mistakes that lead to waste, poor shelf performance, or customer complaints. We’ll cover flexographic, rotogravure, and digital printing, material structures, barrier properties, and supplier negotiations. You’ll also explore real-world packaging tools like calculators, estimators, and smart checklists.
One core goal is to help you make confident packaging decisions faster, especially when working under time or budget constraints.
You’ll also see how AI and automation can reduce guesswork in selecting designs, calculating costs, and troubleshooting packaging problems. This includes export packaging needs, machine compatibility, inventory issues, and sustainability concerns.
The course is created by Mohamed Assad, a flexible packaging strategist and founder of PackagingMarket net, known for developing smart B2B packaging tools.
By the end of the course, you’ll be able to:
Select the right film structure for any product
Estimate packaging cost with accuracy
Communicate better with suppliers
Use digital tools to reduce errors and delays
Learn to treat packaging as a growth lever, not just a cost.؟
target_audience: Manufacturers and production managers who want to improve packaging quality, reduce costs, and avoid common technical issues.  Buyers and procurement officers looking to make smarter, faster material decisions without relying entirely on suppliers.  Marketing and business development professionals who want to understand packaging's impact on branding, product shelf life, and customer satisfaction.  Startup founders, entrepreneurs, and exporters in the food, chemical, or consumer goods sectors seeking practical packaging strategies.  Anyone curious about flexible packaging and how it can become a competitive advantage — whether you're in sales, design, or operations.

courses.description:
Freelancer Satış Yapma (Kazanç artırma yöntemleri)


Bu kurs freelancer çalışarak daha çok para kazanmayı hedefleyen kişiler için hazırlanmıştır.
Bu kursumuzda freelancer çalışma yöntemlerini, daha çok kazanmanız için bazı taktikler hazırlanmıştır.
Eğitim yaklaşık 8 saat olup içerisinde bir çok önemli bilgiler bulunmaktadır. Videolar sürekli güncellenmektedir.
Eğitim içerisinde bulunan önemli konular şu şekildedir.
Eğitimi izledikten sonra başarılı bir şekilde iş ilanı oluşturabilir ve sizlerde kazancınızın arttığını görebilirsiniz.
Freelancer para kazanma methodları
Freelancer para kazanabileceğiniz türk siteler
Freelancer para kazanabileceğiniz yabancı siteler
Freelancer çalışma hayatı
Freelancer çalışarak hangi meslekleri yapabilirsiniz?
Freelancer kazanç elde etmek için nelere dikkat etmeliyiz ?
Freelancer sitelerde nasıl üst sıralara çıkabiliriz?
Freelancer sitelerde iş ilanını nasıl oluşturabiliriz?
Ayrıca freelancer siteler olmadan kendimiz nasıl satış yapabiliriz ?
Türk freelancer sitelerde mi satış yapmak daha mantıklı yoksa yabancı freelancer sitelerde satış yapmak mı?
Bu ve daha fazlası bu kursumuzun içerisinde bulunmaktadır. Sizlerde kursumuzu satın alarak bu içeriklerden daha fazlasını da bulabileceksiniz.
Sizlerde bu kursumuzu alarak aklınıza takılan en ufak bir sorunu bile eğitim içerisinde sorabilir ve maximum 1 saat içerisinde sorularınıza cevap bulabilirsiniz.
Sizlerde eğitimi izledikten sonra kazançlarınızın en az 2 kat artacağını ve daha önce yapmış olduğunuz çok ufak hataların sizlere ne gibi sıkıntılar vereceğini de yine bu  eğitim de göreceksiniz.
Eğitim herhangi bir ön koşul gerektirmemektedir. Eğer hiç bir yeteneğiniz bile yoksa yine eğitimde sizleri yönlendirecek ve yeteneğinizi bulabilecek dersler de eğitim içinde  mevcuttur.
O halde kursumuzun içerisinde görüşmek üzere.
target_audience: Freelancer çalışarak para kazanmak isteyenler

Uygulamalı Öğrenme: Teorik bilgilerin ötesine geçerek, her konu üzerinde pratik yapma fırsatları sunuyoruz. Kurs boyunca çeşitli projelerle kendinizi geliştirecek ve öğrendiklerinizi hemen uygulayabileceksiniz.
Etsy'de Satış Yapma Yeteneği: Kursun bir odak noktası, öğrendiğiniz becerileri Etsy gibi online pazar yerlerinde kullanarak gelir elde etme yeteneğinizi artırmaktır. Kendi yaratıcılığınızı sergileyip bunu bir gelire dönüştürmek istiyorsanız, doğru yerdesiniz.
Sonuç:
Bu kurs, sizi 3D dünyasına taşıyacak bir kapı aralayacak. Hem hobi amaçlı kullanım hem de ticari bir bakış açısıyla bu teknolojileri öğrenmek isteyen herkes için uygun. Umarım bu kaynak, yeni beceriler kazanmanıza ve bu alanın sunduğu fırsatları keşfetmenize yardımcı olur.
Hepinize başarılar diler, keyifli bir öğrenme süreci geçirmenizi umarım!
Saygılarımla,
Anıl İDİ

courses.title: Marketing Mastery
courses.bio: Push dan Pull Marketing
objectives: Push marketing
Pull marketing
Program promosi trade promo
Program promosi consumer promo
Alat promosi trade promo

Push Marketing: Apa yang Dimaksud dengan Push Marketing Part 1
Apa yang Dimaksud dengan Push Marketing Part 2
Apa yang Dimaksud dengan Pull Marketing Part 1
Apa yang Dimaksud dengan Pull Marketing Part 2
Kapan Program Push dan Pull Marketing: Kapan Program Push dan Pull Marketing Part 1
Kapan Program Push dan Pull Marketing Part 2

requirements: Seseorang yang bekerja di bidang marketing dan pemasaran
courses.description:
Banyak produk yang secara mengejutkan mampu membukukan penjualan yang mencengangkan di awal peluncurannya. Mungkin dia saat itu bukan pemimpin pasar atau pioneer di kategorinya, namun gebrakan pasarnya membuat para kompetitornya kewalahan. Merek tersebut bahkan menjungkalkan pemimpin pasar sebelumnya.

Untuk mempromosikan dan menjual merek atau produknya, pemasar dan pengecer menggunakan dua jurus, yakni push dan pull strategi. Produsen, grosir dan distributor "mendorong" produk ke pengecer dan pengecer mendorong produk kepada pelanggan. Pengecer juga menarik pelanggan dengan berbagai metode. Pengecer sering menggunakan kombinasi pendekatan push-pull untuk menarik pelanggan potensial.
Perbedaan utama antara push dan pull marketing terletak pada bagaimana konsumen didekati. Dalam push marketing, idenya adalah untuk mempromosikan produk dengan membuat produk tersebut sampai ke konsumen. Bila itu dilakukan maka tampilan penjualan dan iming-iming buat pembeli di toko perlu diperhatikan.
Sementara itu, dalam pull marketing, idenya adalah untuk membangun kesetiaan dan menarik konsumen kepada produk. Contohnya adalah Porsche dan Lamborghini. Dua merek tersebut perlu lagi beriklan karena konsumen akan mendatangi kepada mereka.
Push Marketing
Push marketing adalah strategi promosi yang digunakan oleh pemasar agar merek atau produk yang dikelolanya sampai ke pelanggan. Taktiknya secara umum misalnya menjual barang dagangan secara langsung kepada pelanggan melalui showroom perusahaan dan bernegosiasi dengan pengecer untuk menjual produk mereka, atau mengatur point-of-sale. Untuk kepentingan tersebut, untuk meningkatkan visibilitas, seringkali pengecer menerima insentif penjualan khusus dalam bentuk pertukaran baik berupa uang maupun produk.
Salah satu contoh push marketing dapat dilihat di department store yang menjual parfum atau pendekatan yang dilakukan tenaga penjual obat-obatan kepada dokter. Produsen parfum sering menawarkan insentif penjualan ke department store untuk mendorong produk-produknya ke pelanggan. Taktik ini bisa sangat bermanfaat bagi merek-merek baru yang belum mapan atau lini merek baru tertentu yang membutuhkan promosi tambahan. Secara keseluruhan, yang ditawarkan kepada banyak konsumen di toko adalah aroma parfum sehingga konsumen mendapatkan pengalaman pertama dan baru dengan produk. Asumsinya pengalaman tersebut diciptakan karena selama ini belum mengetahuinya.
Pull Marketing
Pull marketing mengambil pendekatan yang berlawanan. Tujuan pull marketing adalah membuat pelanggan mendatangi merek. Taktik penjualan umum yang biasa digunakan meliputi promosi melalui media massa, word-of-mouth terarah, dan penjualan melalui iklan. Dari perspektif bisnis, pull marketing merupakan upaya menciptakan loyalitas merek dan membuat pelanggan datang kembali, sedangkan push marketing lebih ditujukan untuk penjualan jangka pendek.
Contoh pull marketing sering Anda jumpai. Merek atau produk dipromosikan melalui kampanye pemasaran dengan iklan. Tarik pemasaran ini membutuhkan biaya yang besar untuk periklanan. Salah satu contoh adalah pemasaran mainan anak-anak. Pada tahap pertama, perusahaan mengiklankan produk tersebut. Selanjutnya, anak-anak dan orang tua melihat iklan dan ingin membeli mainan. Begitu permintaan meningkat, pengecer mulai berusaha merebut pangsa pasar produk di toko . Sementara itu, perusahaan telah berhasil menarik pelanggan mereka.


Trainer:
Bambang Mulyadi
-Penulis buku Nugget is a Big Market
-Asistant P.T. Primafood International sister Company P.T. Charoen Pokphand Indonesia yang bergerak dalam produk FMCG yaitu Chicken Nugget dengan merk
Fiesta.
target_audience: Marketing dan pemasaran

content marketing

So, how do you suggest we should go about learning it? Well, I have an idea.
Let us do it for a SaaS company and learn along with the business. Meet LandItRight a SaaS business that sells a Landing page builder product. They have to start their product sales and marketing, and we have the liberty to listen to their meetings and then learn from them.

This course will walk you through the high-level basics of a Shopify store

If you are wanting to begin your ecommerce journey, Shopify is a great place to start. Shopify's clean, simple, and easy-to-use software enables an individual to create a brand that can seem like it has dozens of employees.
Many people don't even know where to begin, so this mini-course will help you with that. We'll go over the basics of Shopify, some best practices I've learned along the way, and some tips and tricks to get your headed in the right direction. Essentially, you'll have an understanding of what Shopify is and how it works.
You'll also learn how to configure the look and feel of the site with themes and we'll look at configuring payments, shipping, apps, and more. After this course is done, you'll have the background knowledge necessary to spin up your own Shopify store and get started.
This class is an individual section of my much larger masterclass: "How To Create An Online Store: Fundamentals of eCommerce". After completion of this class, I recommend taking some other sections a-la-carte, or taking the entire masterclass (see my instructor profile for more details).

Generally, if you are looking to make money off of an ecommerce store, this course is for you.

Com certeza é um mundo de possibilidades. Por que não adentrá-lo? Por que não redigir textos persuasivos que preencham a mente e a imaginação? Essa é uma pergunta que você deve responder?

Este curso está destinado a profissionais das mais diversas áreas, tais como: jornalistas, psicólogos, economistas e administradores. A experiência se torna ainda mais rica pelos comentários, referentes aos exemplos, contidos na capacitação. Desse modo, a aprendizagem acontece de forma interativa, por meio da exposição dialógica que permeia todo o conteúdo. Além disso, ele foi elaborado com base em conceitos atualizados  e referenciados por importantes autores da comunicação clara, assertiva e persuasiva.  Sem dúvida,  trata-se de uma experiência mágica, a qual você deve se dedicar para aproveitar todo o conteúdo disponibilizado. Outra vantagem é que após terminar o treinamento, você poderá revê-lo, consultar as atualizações, anotar partes que julgar importante e, finalmente, aplicar o Copywriting de forma assertiva e eficaz.
Então, faça a sua parte, matricule-se neste curso e realize seu sonho de aprender Redação Estratégica & Copywriting.

courses.title: Processing fermented milk namely Mala from cow or goat milk
courses.bio: Impacting knowledge on how to process Mala from cow or goat milk, expanding market and maintaining customers confidence
objectives: How fermented milk is processed ;milk is allowed to ferment with lactic acid bacteria,making it possibble for those with lactose intolerance to use the products
How to get good raw material for milk for the best final product with the consumer in mind for safe end products meeting the market standards requiremenents set
How to do simple platform tests using the five senses- organoleptic tests (smell, sight ,touch ,hear and taste) for production of the good quality final product
What to do in-order to evaluate the final product to check if it meets the quality expectations in line with checking if the personnel adhered to the processes

Introduction-I am a trained dairy techno: Introduction I am Velentinah well trained in fermented milk processing i.e Mala
Terminologies used in fermented milk processing (mala) -up to product evaluation
How to separate/ segregate good quality milk from poor quality for best product
Reasons for adhering to continuous milk agitation when we do milk pasteurization
How to evaluate the final product aiming to evaluate the adherence of processes
How to process fermented milks (mala) focusing on the quality product in markets

requirements: What is needed is the basic education where one can read and write and able to understand the language being taught
courses.description:
Milk is a complex physiological liquid that simultaneously provides nutrients and bioactive components that facilitate the successful postnatal adaptation of the newborn infant by stimulating cellular growth and digestive maturation, the establishment of symbiotic microflora, and the development of gut-associated lymphoid tissues. The number, the potency, and the importance of bioactive compounds in milk and especially in fermented milk products are probably greater than previously thought. They include vitamins, proteins, bioactive peptides, and fatty acids.
Some of them are normal milk components, others emerge during digestive or fermentation processes. Whey proteins, medium-chain fatty acids and in particular calcium and other minerals may contribute to the beneficial effect of dairy food on body.
Milk proteins, peptides, probiotic lactic acid bacteria, calcium and other minerals can significantly  improve human heath. Fermentation breaks down milk proteins and lactose. This benefits people with milk protein allergies and lactose intolerance.
Its also NEEDED by people of all ages due to its nutritional value.
Fermented milk( MALA) processing is a simple way of fermenting well pasteurized milk. The pasteurized milk is cultured with  the mala fermenting micro-organisms and incubated for the given period.
Note
This course needs a person who can understand and willing to follow instructions on how to employ the technology. A basic education with a knowledge of reading and writing is of an added advantage.
Mala is a nutritious  milk product profitable to people of all ages. Its a complete food  rich in carbohydrates, proteins, fats, vitamins, minerals, fiber and water.
Its demand is high therefore  quality is key as we engage in the processing.
We have the responsibility of ensuring  safety of the public and  meeting the customers expectations by ensuring our products are to the standards set by the governments.
Quality product is key for  growing  the market and maintaining the market space.
Things to note in processing quality mala  and expand  market and maintain customers confidence
Processing mala product can be done once the technology required is rightly captured and followed.
Processing is easy and can be done in a home set-up.
Its required that the personnel handling milk should be medically certified.
The environment should be clean with fresh air and without any foul smells.
The animal being milked should be healthy
The equipment should be of the recommended container for milk handling.
The detergents  should be of light lather and mild smell so as not to introduce any form of contamination.
Milk should not have any traces of veterinary drugs or off flavor e.g. from feeds, and taints
Follow carefully the procedures for milk pasteurization, cooling , inoculation , incubation and finally evaluation of the final
product
Milk  handling for the purpose of processing should be done hygienically to avoid contamination i.e. from production  to processing.
Get good quality raw material  - the final product will  be poor if the raw material was poor.
Note:
To maintain standard of the product;  sample testing of the output against specifications is paramount in maintaining  the quality required .
target_audience: Those who want to venture in dairy business on the value added product
Those who want to be knowledgeable on  quality  raw milk reception for the best final product with  the consumer in mind for safe products meeting the market standards requirement
For training on how to do simple platform tests using the five senses- organoleptic tests (smell, sight ,touch ,hear and taste) for production of the good quality final product
For those working on evaluation of the final product to check if it  meets the quality expectations in the line in checking if the workers adhered to the processes

CRM是指客户关系管理系统，能够协调企业与顾客间在销售、营销和服务上的交互，从而提升管理方式，向客户提供创新式的个性化的客户交互和服务，其最终目标是吸引新客户、保留老客户以及将已有客户转为忠实客户，增加市场。
为了帮助你更加深入地认识和了解CRM，三节课特别邀请到拥有10年+CRM产品相关经验的资深玩家——洪炼老师，手把手教你从0到1完成CRM产品的规划与设计。
课程主要包括四个部分：
第一部分围绕“什么是CRM”展开，带你了解CRM的产生背景、商业价值构成要素和发展趋势；

第三、四部分分别介绍了CRM的重点模块——客户管理和营销管理模块，从业务规则到产品界面设计，进行详细的讲解

¿Qué aprenderás?


Introducción al Visual Merchandising: Obtén una comprensión sólida de los conceptos básicos y la importancia del Visual Merchandising en el entorno minorista actual.
Diseño de Espacios Comerciales: Descubre cómo aprovechar al máximo el diseño del espacio, considerando aspectos como la distribución, el flujo de tráfico, la iluminación y la ambientación.
Composición y Exhibición de Productos: Aprende a organizar y exhibir los productos de manera atractiva, utilizando técnicas de agrupación, equilibrio visual y jerarquía.
Diseño de Escaparates: Conviértete en un experto en la creación de escaparates llamativos que cautiven a los transeúntes y los motiven a entrar a tu tienda.
Psicología del Consumidor: Descubre cómo utilizar los principios de la psicología del consumidor para influir en las decisiones de compra y crear experiencias de compra memorables
Vamos a entender que con pequeños cambios podemos lograr grandes resultados en nuestro punto de venta. Lo importante es comprender como captar la atención de nuestros clientes de manera positiva.
También veremos como respetar al consumidor y su tiempo, con estos principios le vamos a presentar un ambiente en donde se sienta seguro, tranquilo y fácil de navegar.
¿Para quién es este curso?
Personas que quieran experimentar el campo del visual merchandising o tengan curiosidad.
Profesionales en el mercadeo que quieran aprender de retail
Dueños de tiendas de venta al por menor
Principiantes, lo importante es tener interés en el tema
target_audience: Perfecto para personal de ventas al detal, gerentes de tiendas, almas creativas, o cualquier persona interesada en el campo de visual merchandising

requirements: Herhangi bir ön koşul bulunmamakla birlikte istekli olmak ve gereken zamanı ayırmak gerekmektedir. Tavsiyemiz bu programı parça parça değil bir oturuşta bitirmenizdir.
courses.description:
İknanın temellerini öğrenmek için günlerce çalışmanıza gereksiz akademik bilgileri zihninize yüklemenize gerek yok. Bir kahve molasında bile hayatınızı değiştirecek önemli ipuçlarına sahip olabilirsiniz.
Size arka arkaya iki soru soracağım ve hızlı bir şekilde yanıt vermenizi isteyeceğim. Soru şu: Bir insanın ellerinde kaç parmak bulunur?.......... Çok güzel ! Peki, on elde kaç parmak bulunur?
Siz de ilk soruya 10 ikinci soruya da 100 yanıtını verdiyseniz hiç endişelenmeyin siz de hemen hemen herkes gibi kolaylıkla manipüle edilebiliyorsunuz demektir.
Şimdi derin bir nefes alın ikinci pratiğimizi yapalım. Yüksek sesle hiç durmadan şu kelimeyi tekrarlamanızı istiyorum, “Beyaz”. Hadi hiç durmadan arka arkaya “Beyaz” deyin. Siz tekrarlamayı yaparken size bir soru soracağım ve hiç düşünmeden yanıt vermenizi istiyorum. Sorum şu: “İnekler ne içer?”
Yüzde 99 ihtimalle yanıtınız “süt” değil mi? Peki neden, inekler süt içer mi?
Bu örneklerde neler oluyor niye sonuçlara ulaşıyoruz? Bunun sebebi çok basit beynimiz sürekli olarak “shortcut” dediğimiz kestirme yollara sapıyor. Şöyle düşünelim, araba kullanmaya ilk başladığınız günleri hatırlayın. Tüm hareketleri sırasıyla ne kadar dikkatli yapıyordunuz değil mi? Önce debriyaja bas, sonra vitesi tak…. Peki ya şimdi araba kullanırken tekrar tekrar bu ayrıntıları düşünüyor musunuz? Elbette ki hayır. Beyniniz bir kere öğrendi ve artık o işi otomatik pilota bağladı.
Beynimiz hızlı hareket etmek, daha çok üretebilmek ve önemli konulara daha fazla zaman ayırabilmek için zamanın büyük kısmında otomatik pilotta çalışır. Bu elzemdir. Eğer öyle olmasaydı her an her saniye detayları düşünerek yaşayamazdık değil mi?
Beynimiz kendi kendine otomatik davranışlar oluşturduğu gibi dışarıdan bilinçli bir şekilde etkilenerek otomatik davranışlar oluşturması sağlanabilir, yıllardır sağlanıyor da.
İkna edici iletişimin usta ismi Gazeteci yazar Ahmet Veli Olgundeniz, temel ve ileri ikna teknikleri basit ve hedef odaklı bir üslupla anlatıyor. İş görüşmesine gidecek olanlar, satış pazarlama işinde olanlar, gayrimenkul satışı yapanlar, kendini daha iyi ifade etmek ve sözünün dinlenmesini isteyenler mutlaka kursa bir göz atın! Kursumuz teorik anlatımlar pratik örneklerle pekiştirildi.
target_audience: İş arayanlar, kariyerinde yükselmek isteyenler

courses.title: Master Make: Build Automated Lead Gen Workflows & AI Agents
courses.bio: Build powerful LinkedIn automation, lead nurturing systems, and business workflows from scratch using Make
objectives: Master Make fundamentals including webhooks, triggers, flow control, and scenario scheduling
Build automated Lead Reply Slack Notifiers that instantly alert you when prospects respond to outreach
Create LinkedIn Competitor Engagement Agents that automatically find and message warm prospects
Develop AI-powered LinkedIn Content Creation workflows that generate and schedule posts automatically

Automation 2 - LinkedIn Competitor Engag: Tutorial - LinkedIn Competitor Engagement Outreach Agent
Automation 3 - LinkedIn Content Creation: Tutorial - LinkedIn Content Creation and Scheduling Agent

requirements: No prior automation experience required - you'll learn everything from scratch. You only need a computer with internet access and a willingness to build game-changing workflows. A free Make account is recommended to follow along with the tutorials.
courses.description:
You want to automate your lead generation, but Make looks complicated. This course fixes that problem by teaching you exactly how to build three working automation systems that actually bring in leads.


Most Make tutorials skip the important stuff. They show you basic connections but never explain how to handle webhooks, API calls, or complex triggers that real businesses need. You'll learn the technical parts that matter, like setting up HTTP requests, configuring proper error handling, and building workflows that won't break.


Here's what you'll build. First automation sends Slack notifications when leads respond to your outreach emails. No more checking multiple inboxes or missing hot prospects. Second automation finds people engaging with your competitors on LinkedIn, then automatically adds them to your outreach sequence. Third automation creates and schedules LinkedIn posts based on your content calendar, keeping your profile active without manual posting.


Each automation comes with step-by-step blueprints. You'll see exactly which modules to use, how to connect them, and what settings to configure. The course covers Make basics first - dashboard navigation, module types, scenario building, and operations. Then we move into advanced topics like webhook configuration, API authentication, flow control logic, and scheduling systems.


You'll also learn troubleshooting skills that most courses ignore. What happens when an API goes down? How do you handle rate limits? These real-world problems kill most automation projects, but you'll know how to solve them.


This works for business owners who need more leads without hiring more people. Marketing teams who want to stop doing repetitive tasks. Sales reps who miss follow-ups because they're juggling too many prospects.


No coding experience needed. By the end, you'll have three live automations generating leads for your business plus the knowledge to build your own custom workflows.
target_audience: Agency owners looking to scale operations without hiring more team members. Lead generation professionals wanting to automate repetitive outreach tasks. Sales professionals ready to multiply their prospecting efforts. Aspiring AI engineers interested in learning practical automation skills. Small business owners who want to generate leads while they sleep. Anyone tired of manual lead generation processes and ready to build systems that work 24/7.

requirements: Não há Pré-Requisitos
courses.description:
Para empreender de verdade e obter grandes resultados na área de marketing, é necessário entender principalmente o comportamento humano e a jornada de decisão do consumidor. Com a Formação Neuromarketing na Prática , você precisa de tecnologia para impulsionar o crescimento dos seus negócios, por meio do Neuromarketing e da Neurociência aplicada de forma prática para orientar em como você pode aumentar seus resultados.
O objetivo da Formação Neuromarketing na Prática , é fornecer um programa definitivo para aumentar o resultado baseado em empreendedorismo, ciência comportamental, vendas e tecnologia para gerar crescimento acelerado, robusto e sustentável dos negócios.
POR QUE ENTENDER OS PADRÕES DE PENSAMENTO, EMOÇÕES E COMPORTAMENTOS HUMANOS?
Porque o negócio do futuro não é baseado no produto, nem no consumidor, mas sim no ser humano. O seu consumidor não é uma lógica de decisões centrais, ele é humano e humanos possuem mentalidade, comportamento e comportamento, e a maioria das nossas decisões estão ligadas como nossas emoções, memórias, valores e identidade. Nesta Era Exponencial, quem quiser ter sucesso em qualquer negócio e empreender com os resultados e grande impacto, precisa entender principalmente sobre o comportamento humano, sobre as novas estratégias e ferramentas de marketing e desta vendas nova era.
A Formação Neuromarketing na Prática utiliza os insights da neurociência e os estudos sobre a mente na identificação do comportamento humano, desvendando as reais necessidade do consumidor, pois existem processos, processos e hacks que são capazes de impulsionar o crescimento dos negócios. A formação conta ainda com diversos recursos exclusivos, além de acompanhamento e mentoria.
IMPORTANTE: Esse curso possui como bônus para você você, mentoria por inteligência artificial, Dentro do curso você encontrará as orientações de como acessar na aula intitulada: Meu presente para você
O diferencial desta formação é que além da tecnologia de vanguarda, todo o conteúdo apresentado é filmado e fruto de mais de duas décadas de atendimentos a pessoas e empresas, e técnico em sala de aula com a pessoas reais na solução de problemas também reais , e com resultados reais, objetivando alavancar suas vidas e carreiras. Não se trata apenas de teorias que não resistem à realidade das dificuldades dos contextos profissionais ou pessoais, mas de técnicas que você verá em tempo real se mostrando efetivas em resolver bloqueios e limitações, e aumentar rapidamente os resultados nas mais diversas áreas da vida das pessoas que ali estão.
target_audience: Empreendedores e Aspirante a empreendedor, Gerentes, Líderes de todas as áreas, Profissionais de marketing e vendas e Interessados em aprender sobre esse tema de estrema relevância para o aumento dos resultados e para o sucesso do seu negócio.

objectives: Commencer avec le Print-On-Demand

requirements: avoir un téléphone ou un ordinateur connecté à internet
courses.description:
UN BUSINESS PUISSANT ET RENTABLE.


Désormais, si je te disais que le business en question, tu n’en connais peut-être même pas l’existence...
Mais surtout, qu’il se met en place juste avec une connexion internet et un ordinateur. RIEN DE PLUS.
Et que depuis chez-toi ou n’importe où ailleurs, tu puisses générer des revenus.
Pour tout te dire, on a mis en place ce business pendant 1 an et les résultats sont juste énormes.
Maintenant, est ce que ça t'intéresserait ?


Si OUI, je t’invite à lire la suite ! (pour commencer réellement à faire de l’argent)


Le Print on quoi ???


Si tu ne connais pas je vais t’expliquer.


En fait, le Print on demand ou “POD” c’est le fait de vendre vos propres design sur différents types de produits ( t-shirt, mugs, sweat, casquette, sac à dos etc…)
Et tout ça sans avoir de stock, votre prestataire de Print on Demand se charge de tout, de l’impression à l'expédition. Le processus est 100% automatisé !
Le meilleur business à lancer pour 2022 !
De part sa facilité, de n’avoir aucun stock et qu’il soit 100% automatisé, c’est de loin l’un des business les plus prometteurs de 2022.


Avec la crise du covid, le marché en ligne a considérablement augmenté.
Énormément de personnes vivent de leurs business en ligne et du Print on Demand, alors pourquoi pas toi ?!
Pourquoi toi, tu n’y arriverais pas ?!
On t'explique tout !
target_audience: chômeurs, entrepreneurs, étudiants, parent au foyer

TRADE MAP İLE İHRACATTA PAZAR ANALİZİ VE: TRADE MAP TANITIMI VE KULLANIM ALANLARI
TRADE MAP'E KAYIT VE GİRİŞ İŞLEMLERİ
HS CODE VE ÜRÜN İSMİ İLE ARAMA İŞLEMLERİ
ÜLKE VE PARTNER ÜLKE İSMİ İLE ARAMA İŞLEMLERİ

ÖRNEK HEDEF PAZAR VE MÜŞTERİ TESPİTİ ÇALIŞMASI

requirements: Kurs eğitmenin ekran paylaşımı şeklinde gerçekleştirileceğinden ötürü öğrencilerin kursu takip ederken internet bağlantısı olan bir bilgisayar kullanmaları uygun olacaktır.
courses.description:
Dış ticaret dünyasında doğru bilgiye hızlı erişim, başarılı stratejiler oluşturmanın en kritik adımıdır. İşte bu noktada **Trade Map** devreye giriyor. ITC (International Trade Centre) tarafından geliştirilen bu eşsiz platform, uluslararası ticaret istihbaratına dair en kapsamlı ve güncel bilgiyi sunarak ihracatçılar, ithalatçılar ve ticaret profesyonelleri için vazgeçilmez bir kaynak haline geliyor.
Trade Map ile Neler Yapabilirsiniz?
1. Ticaret Akışlarını Takip Edin: Ülkeler arasındaki ithalat ve ihracat hacimlerini detaylı bir şekilde analiz ederek, ürün bazında ticaret akışlarını izleyebilirsiniz.
2. Hedef Pazar Analizi: Potansiyel pazarlarda ürünlerinizin ithalat trendlerini, büyüme oranlarını ve rekabet düzeyini değerlendirin.
3. Rakiplerinizi Tanıyın: Ana rakiplerinizin ticaret verilerini, hedef pazarlarını ve ticaret stratejilerini analiz ederek rekabet avantajı kazanın.
4. Gümrük Tarifeleri ve Vergiler: Ülkelere özgü gümrük vergisi oranlarını ve ticaret kısıtlamalarını inceleyerek stratejik kararlar alın.
Neden Trade Map?
- Kapsamlı Veri: 220'den fazla ülke ve bölge için ticaret verisi.
- Ürün Bazlı Detay:  5,300'den fazla ürün kategorisinde HS kodlarına dayalı analiz.
- Kullanıcı Dostu Arayüz: Verilere kolayca ulaşmanızı sağlayan pratik ve modern tasarım.
Kime Hitap Ediyor?
Trade Map, KOBİ’lerden büyük ölçekli firmalara, ihracat danışmanlarından akademisyenlere kadar geniş bir kitleye hitap eder. Dış ticarette bilgi güçtür ve Trade Map bu gücü sizin için erişilebilir kılar.
Trade Map ile Stratejik Kararlar Alın
Dış ticaret verileri, yalnızca bilgi edinmekle kalmaz, aynı zamanda stratejik kararlar almanızı sağlar. Trade Map, ihracat ve ithalat trendlerini görselleştirme yeteneğiyle veri analizini daha etkili hale getirir. Özellikle ürün bazında pazar seçimi yaparken, büyüme potansiyeline sahip pazarları belirlemek için kullanabileceğiniz bu platform, zaman kazandırır ve kaynaklarınızı daha verimli kullanmanızı sağlar.
Ayrıca Trade Map’in sunduğu istatistikler, sürdürülebilir iş modelleri oluşturmanıza ve global pazarda uzun vadeli başarı elde etmenize yardımcı olur. Rekabet avantajı için Trade Map’i şimdi kullanmaya başlayın!
target_audience: İhracata başlamak ve/veya ihracat satışlarını arttırmak için pazar araştırması yapmak isteyen girişimci veya dış ticaret elamanları

courses.description:
Welcome to From Zero to 7-Figures: Amazon Product Research Masterclass - your definitive guide to mastering the art of product research on Amazon FBA. Dive deep into proven strategies and techniques that will help you identify high-demand products, ensuring your success in the Amazon marketplace.


About the Instructor:
Meet Tomer (From Sourcing Monster) a seasoned Amazon FBA seller who embarked on this journey in 2019. With a relentless pursuit of knowledge and a sharp business acumen, Tomer scaled the business to reach the 7-figure mark in a mere 18 months.
But the success didn't stop there. In 2022, after achieving incredible growth, the business was sold for a whopping 2,000,000 Million dollars.
But for entrepreneurs like Tomer, the sky is the limit. Using the experience and insights gathered, Tomer ventured again and successfully established another 7-figure business.
In this masterclass, Tomer will share the secrets of effective product research using tools like Jungle Scout, shedding light on what it takes to thrive on Amazon FBA. From identifying potential product niches to analyzing market demand and competition, this course covers it all.


Join us and equip yourself with the knowledge and strategies that have been tested and proven in the real-world Amazon marketplace. Turn your ambitions into reality and start your journey to becoming a 7-figure seller today!
target_audience: Aspiring Amazon Sellers: If you're looking to start your journey in the Amazon FBA world and need a step-by-step guide to kickstart your venture, this course is your roadmap.

Existing Amazon Sellers: For those who've already dipped their toes into Amazon selling but want to elevate their game, especially in product research and selection, this course offers advanced strategies and insights from a 7-figure seller.

E-commerce Enthusiasts: Whether you're an online store owner, a dropshipper, or someone fascinated by e-commerce dynamics, understanding Amazon's vast marketplace through this course can add a valuable feather to your cap.

Digital Marketers and SEO Specialists: If you're in the digital marketing realm, understanding how product research and keyword optimization work on Amazon can expand your skillset and service offerings.

Anyone Seeking a Side Hustle: If you're exploring potential side hustles and are intrigued by the prospect of selling on Amazon, this course will equip you with the knowledge and tools to make informed decisions.

courses.title: Marketing für Buchautoren im Selfpublishing
courses.bio: Strategien und Wege für dein Buchmarketing
objectives: Verschiedene Marketingmöglichkeiten für Bücher
Marketingideen vor dem Schreiben
Worauf beim Marketing geachtet werden muss
Grundlagen der Marktforschung für Bücher
Schritt für Schritt Anleitung für die einzelnen Phasen des Buchmarketings

Einleitung: Unterschiede im Marketing Sachbuch vs. Belletristik
Vor dem Schreiben: Wo willst du mit deinem Titel hin?
Vor der Veröffentlichung: Darum ist das richtige Genre so wichtig
Finde den richtigen Buchtitel für dein Sachbuch
Bei der Veröffentlichung: Wo veröffentlichst du dein Buch und zu welchem Zeitpunkt
Darauf musst du bei dem Cover achten

requirements: Ein Computer mit internetzugang
Keine tieferen Vorkenntnisse benötigt
courses.description:
Jeder kommt irgendwann an den Punkt, wo man seine Geschichten mit jemandem teilen möchte. Du schreibst diese Gesichte auf oder erstellst gute Sachbuchmanuskripte. Natürlich liegt es hier auch nahe, deine Texte als Buch zu veröffentlichen. Das ist heute auf vielen verschiedenen Plattformen möglich. Doch die Veröffentlichung reicht nicht aus, um erfolgreich zu sein. Dein Buch sollte natürlich auch an die oder den Leser/in kommen. Deine Leser müssen von deinem Buch erfahren. Das schaffst du natürlich mit einer gut durchdachten Marketing-Strategie. Aber wie sieht deine Strategie aus? Was musst du beim Buchmarketing beachten?
Genau diesen Fragen widmet sich dieser Kurs.
Dabei ist es völlig unerheblich, ob du Sachbücher oder Belletristik schreibst. Die Marketingkomponenten für Selfpublisher können Sachbuch und Belletristik-Autoren gleichermaßen anwenden. In diesem Kurs werde ich dich von Station zu Station begleiten und dir Marketingoptionen aufzeigen. die dein Buch für den Erfolg programmieren. Mit einigen dieser Marketingideen konnten Selfpublisher ihre Bücher in Bestseller verwandeln.
Es handelt sich nicht um konkrete Marketingstrategien, sondern Tools. Diese Tools kannst du nutzen, egal wie deine Strategie aussieht. Natürlich werde ich dir in diesem Kurs auch zeigen, wie du eine Marketingstrategie entwickelst. Wir analysieren deine Zielgruppe, stellen Marketing- und Preisstrategien auf und konzentrieren uns auf Informationen, die dir Erfolg versprechen. Ich zeige dir, worauf es bei dem Design von Covern ankommt, wie du Suchmaschinenoptimierung (SEO) machen kannst und worauf es beim Social Media Marketing (Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest und Co.) ankommt. Wir sprechen auch darüber, wie du deine Autorenmarke aufbaust, damit du ein langfristiges passives Einkommen aufbauen kannst.
In die Folgenden Abschnitte ist dieser Kurs aufgeteilt:
Grundlagen zum Marketing.
Bevor du dein Buch schreibst.
Marketing vor der Veröffentlichung.
Optimiere deine Buchveröffentlichung
Marketing nach der Veröffentlichung
Worauf wartest du also?
Schreib dich jetzt in diesen Kurs ein und lass dir Impulse für dein Buchmarketing geben. Mit dem richtigen Marketing schaffst du es, langfristig ein passives Einkommen zu generieren.
target_audience: Buchautoren
Selfpublisher
Leute, die darüber nachdenken, ein Buch zu schreiben
Leute, die sich ein passives Einkommen mit Texten aufbauen wollen
Leute, die sich einen Überblick über Buchmarketing verschaffen wollen

courses.title: Satış 2.0
courses.bio: İkna sürecinin psikolojisini öğrenerek uzman bir ikna edici ve satış uzmanına dönüşün
objectives: Satış pazarlama ve ikna süreçlerini öğrenin
Hızlı ikna edin
İyi bir satış uzmanına dönüşün
Satış ve pazarlamanın insan zihnindeki derinliklerini öğrenin
İkna ve karar alma süreçlerini öğrenin
Satışın psikolojisini öğrenin
Müşterilerinizin karar verme süreçlerini öğrenin
Satış yaptığınız müşteriyi istediğiniz ürün ya da hizmete nasıl yönlendirmeniz gerektiğini öğrenin
Müşterinizi hızlı ikna etmeyi öğrenin
Müşterinizin satış algısını yönetmeyi öğrenin
Ürün ve hizmetlerinizi hızlı bir şekilde satmayı ve pazarlamayı öğrenin
Satış ve pazarlamayı hayatınızın her alanında kullanmayı öğrenin
requirements: Herhangi bir satış deneyimi olması gerekmez. Bu kursta satışın ve iknanın süreçlerini öğreneceksiniz.
courses.description:
Emrah KILINÇ
Uzman Eğitmen - Kişisel Gelişim Uzmanı ve Yedi Aynayı Kırmak Kitabının Yazarı
Türkiye'nin en çok satan satış pazarlama ve ikna teknikleri eğitiminin ilk çıkışının üzerinden epey uzun bir zaman geçti. Öncelikle göstermiş olduğunuz yoğun ilgi için sizlere teşekkür ederim. Binlerce olumlu yorumunuz ve yıldızlarınız benim motivasyon kaynağım oldu. Bu kadar zamandan sonra satış pazarlama ve ikna sürecinin daha derinliklerine inecek bu eğitimi hazırlamaya karar verdim. Bu eğitim öncelikle iş hayatında satış becerilerinizi güçlendirmek , satışın psikolojisini daha iyi anlamak amacı ile hazırlanmış olsa da aslında hayatınızın her alanında sizi başarıya taşıyacak , ikna sürecinin bütün inceliklerini öğrenmeniz için tarafımdan dizayn edildi. Çünkü satış ve ikna konusunda iyi olan biri hayatının her alanında kazanır. En mükemmel ürünü yapmanız , en iyi eseri ortaya çıkarmanız ya da çok başarılı bir insan olmanız insanların gözünde çok fazla bir anlam ifade etmez. Onu doğru bir şekilde satıp satamadığınıza bakarlar.
Günlük hayatta hepimiz amatörce ya da profesyonelce satış becerilerimizi kullanıyoruz. Bir iş için mülakata giriyoruz , aslında CV'mizi şirkete satıyoruz. Bir dostumuzu ikna etmek istediğimizde , düşüncelerimizi satıyoruz. Projemizi yöneticimize sunduğumuzda aslında yine , o fikrimizin , güzel bir fikir olduğunu satıyoruz. Yani güzel dostlarım biz satışı sadece bir şirkette bir ürünü ya da hizmeti satmak için kullanmıyoruz , hayatımız satışın içinde geçiyor.
Peki bazı insanlar neden satış ve ikna konusunda bu kadar başarılı? Neleri doğru yaptıkları için satışlarını başarı ile sonuçlandırabiliyorlar?
Bunu iyi bir şekilde anlamamız için , kendimizi ve karar verme mekanizmalarımızı anlamamız gerekir. Satış 2.0 eğitiminde satış ve ikna becerilerinizi üst seviyeye taşıyacak satışın psikolojisini anlayacaksınız.  Basit tetikleyiciler ile insanları nasıl hızlı ve kolay bir şekilde ikna edeceğinizin sırlarını öğreneceksiniz. Beynimizin çalışma prensiplerini anladıkça satış bizim için bir çocuk oyuncağına dönüşecek. Artık bir kas refleksi geliştirecek ve istemsiz şekilde çevrenizdeki insanları ikna etmeye başlayacaksınız. Çünkü beynimizde kaslarımız gibi gelişen ve refleks oluşturan bir organımız aslında.
Bu eğitim , karar verme mekanizmalarımızın derinliklerindeki kapıları tek tek açıp , hiç bilmediğiniz yönlerinizi keşfetmenizi sağlayacak. Bu gizemli yolculukta sizlere eşlik etmek benim için büyük bir mutluluk olduğunu bilmenizi isterim.
Hazırsanız
Başlayalım...


Emrah KILINÇ
Kişisel gelişim eğitmeni ve yazar

Chapter8 - 9 (sembila) Skill Yang Harus dimiliki Seorang Sales

requirements: Tidak ada syarat khusus mengikuti kursus ini, hanya perlu alat tulis dan kalkulator
courses.description:
Kursus ini akan membahas tentang cara menjadi tenaga penjulan/Sales yang andal dan siap kerja untuk membuat penjualan selalu laris manis. Kursus ini terdiri dari 10 Cahter sebagai berikut :
1. Pengertian Selling, akan membahas : pengertian selling menurut para ahlinya, manfaat selling dll
2. Prospecting, akan membahas : cara-cara melakukan prospek calon debitur agar bisa memperoleh calon pelanggan yang potensial
3. Persiapan Presentasi Penjualan, akan membahas : apa saja persiapan presentasi agar saat presntasi di depan calon pembeli berjalan mulus dan terjadi closing
4. Presentasi Penjualan, akan membahas : apa saja yang dilakukan saat presentasi di depan calon pembeli agar terjadi closing
5. Negosiasi dengan pembeli, akan membahas : cara-cara dan teknik negosiasi agar tercapai win win solution sehingga terjadi closing the sales
6. Menangani Keberatan Pembeli, akan membahas: teknik-teknik menangani keluhan/komplain dari pembeli atau calon pembeli, sehingga pembeli akan repead order
7. 9 (sembilan) skill yang harus dimiliki oleh seorang Sales agar proses menuju closing menjadi mudah dan lancar
8. Cara Mempengaruhi orang lain/calon pembeli agar orang akan tertarik pada kita dan akhirnya closing the sales
9. Perubahan Paradigma Penjualan, akan membahas hal-hal apa saja agar seorang sales diterima dengan senang hati oleh calon pembeli dan tidak berkesan mamaksa untuk membeli produk/jasa kita.
10. Closing The Sales, akan membahas : cara-cara mengarahkan closing sales, sehingga terjadi penjualan
target_audience: Staf dan Leader di perusahaan

courses.title: Notion: Kompletny Przewodnik Tworzenia Produktów Cyfrowych
courses.bio: Zbuduj swój cyfrowy produkt od zera - zrozumienie procesu, planowanie i wykonanie!
objectives: Zrozumienie Procesu Tworzenia Produktów Cyfrowych: Tworzenie produktu cyfrowego krok po kroku
Planowanie i Organizacja: Planowanie projektów, ustalanie etapów i zadań niezbędnych do stworzenia produktu cyfrowego
Pisanie Efektywnych Opisów Sprzedażowych: Tworzenie przekonującego opisu sprzedażowego, który skutecznie przyciągnie klientów
Badanie i Zrozumienie Grupy Docelowej: Zrozumienie potrzeb grupy docelowej, aby tworzyć produkty, które realnie odpowiadają na ich potrzeby
Tworzenie Treści Edukacyjnych: Przygotowanie atrakcyjnych i wartościowych treści edukacyjnych

Przygotowanie produktu cyfrowego: Jak uzyskać fakturę do zakupionego kursu?
Etap 5 - Wybór platformy i zakończenie prac nad produktem

requirements: Założone konto w Notion (wystarczy darmowa wersja)
Dostęp do internetu i komputera
Otwartość na naukę nowych narzędzi
Gotowość do samodzielnej pracy
courses.description:
Zastanów się, jak wspaniale byłoby posiąść umiejętność tworzenia produktów cyfrowych, które wyróżniają się na rynku i przyciągają uwagę klientów. Właśnie to oferuje kurs "Notion: Kompletny Przewodnik Tworzenia Produktów Cyfrowych".
W świecie, gdzie cyfrowe produkty stają się kluczowym elementem sukcesu biznesowego, to szkolenie, wraz z gotowym do pobrania szablonem Notion stanowi nieocenione źródło wiedzy i inspiracji zarówno dla początkujących, jak i doświadczonych twórców.
W ramach tego kursu przejdziemy przez wszystkie etapy tworzenia produktów cyfrowych: od zrozumienia procesu, przez planowanie i organizację, przygotowanie materiałów szkoleniowych, aż po pisanie efektywnych opisów sprzedażowych. Pokażę Ci, jak zbadać i zrozumieć potrzeby Twojej grupy docelowej, aby Twoje produkty idealnie na nie odpowiadały.
Ten kurs jest idealny dla przedsiębiorców, freelancerów, specjalistów ds. marketingu, edukatorów, pisarzy i twórców treści, a także dla hobbystów i osób szukających dodatkowych dochodów. Wystarczy podstawowa wiedza o Notion (darmowe konto wystarczy), dostęp do Internetu i komputera, a także chęć nauki i samodzielnej pracy.
Sprawdź, jak możesz wykorzystać Notion do stworzenia produktów cyfrowych, które nie tylko zaspokoją Twoje kreatywne aspiracje, ale także przyniosą realne korzyści finansowe.
Zobacz co otrzymujesz w ramach szkolenia i gotowego szablonu Notion:
- Proces tworzenia produktu cyfrowego krok po kroku.
- Ustalanie etapów i zadań w tworzeniu produktów cyfrowych.
- Tworzenie przekonujących opisów sprzedażowych.
- Zrozumienie potrzeb odbiorców w celu dostosowania produktów.
- Przygotowanie wartościowych materiałów edukacyjnych.
- Podsumowanie roczne i miesięczne wyników sprzedaży.
target_audience: Przedsiębiorcy i Freelancerzy: Osoby prowadzące własną działalność, zainteresowane tworzeniem i sprzedażą produktów cyfrowych
Specjaliści ds. Marketingu: Osoby pracujące w marketingu, chcące poszerzyć swoje umiejętności w zakresie produktów cyfrowych
Edukatorzy i Trenerzy: Osoby tworzące materiały edukacyjne, zainteresowane przeniesieniem ich do świata cyfrowego
Pisarze i Twórcy Treści: Autorzy chcący rozszerzyć swoją działalność o ebooki i cyfrowe publikacje
Hobbystyczni Twórcy: Osoby zainteresowane tworzeniem kursów online lub subskrypcji jako forma wyrażania swoich pasji
Osoby Szukające Dodatkowych Dochodów: Indywidualności szukające sposobów na monetyzację swoich umiejętności i wiedzy w Internecie
Blogerzy i Influencerzy: Twórcy internetowi, którzy chcą zdywersyfikować swoje źródła przychodu poprzez produkty cyfrowe
