courses.title: Einstieg ins Produktmanagement
courses.bio: Lernen Sie die Grundlagen aus dem Produktmanagement und Marketing
objectives: Produktmanagement
Produktmarketing
Marketing
Strategie

Grundlagen Produktmanagement: Die 7 P's im Marketing bzw. Produktmanagement

requirements: Grundkenntnisse in Betriebswirtschaft von Vorteil
courses.description:
Allgemein
In jedem Unternehmen dreht sich alles um die angebotenen Produkte und das damit verbundene Produktmanagement. Heute ist der Markt so dynamisch, dass die Produkte immer wieder neu angepasst werden müssen.
Das Produktmanagement hat dabei die Verantwortung für die:
Planung
Steuerung
und Kontrolle
Und zwar von der Einführung, Reife und Ausscheidung auf dem Markt. Hierbei ist es wichtig die Instrumente aus dem Marketing richtig anzuwenden, damit die Produkte auf dem Markt erfolgreich verkauft werden bzw. vom Kunden angenommen werden.
Allerdings muss das Produktmanagement aufpassen Klasse statt Masse anzubieten. Oftmals wird versucht stark in die Breite zu gehen und somit möglichst viele Kunden zu gewinnen. Hier können viele Fehler passieren. Viel zu oft gibt es ein "Weiter so" ohne einen Blick auf die Konkurrenz zu werfen bzw. das Produktangebot kontinuierlich weiterzuentwickeln.
Damit Ihnen das nicht passiert, lernen Sie in diesem Online-Kurs die Grundlagen für erfolgreiches Produktmanagement.
In nur 1 Stunde werden Sie die wichtigsten Begriffe und Instrumente aus dem Produktmanagement kennenlernen.
Ideal, wenn Sie im Produktmanagement einsteigen möchten, oder Ihr Wissen in der Betriebswirtschaft erweitern wollen.


Inhalt
Definition
Aufgaben von Produktmanagern
Typische Fehler im Produktmanagement
Die 7 P's aus dem Marketing
strategische Fragen im Produktmanagement
Produkt-Markt-Matrix nach Igor Ansoff
Was macht der Wettbewerb
Wirtschaftlichkeitsanalyse und Deckungsbeitragsrechnung (DBR)
Bewertung von Produkten
Strategisches Produktmanagement
Zusätzlich erhalten Sie die verwendeten Excel-Vorlagen Produktmarkt-Matrix, Wettbewerbsanalyse und das Scoring Modell, um das Erlernte auch in der Praxis direkt anzuwenden.
target_audience: Junior Produktmanager

courses.description:
Imaginez un instant avoir un métier en OR pour pouvoir vous versez un confortable salaire juste en vendant des produits ou services premium  avec votre téléphone, sans techniques de persuasions compliquer, sans avoir la fibre commerciale, qu'est-ce que cela changerait pour vous ?


Plus besoin de routine métro, boulot, dodo


Plus besoin d'être un expert en persuasions


Plus besoin d'aller mendier pour rechercher un travail


NON tout cela s'est fini, grâce à un métier en plein BOUM !:
Ce métier c'est closer


C'est un salaire confortable depuis votre domicile.


Ce sont des entreprises qui vont s'arracher vos services.


Vous avez peut-être essayé par le passé avec votre par téléphone et ça été un échec, ce n'est pas de votre faute.
Les techniques commerciales que l'on va à enseigner sont dépassées, et vous ont même discrédité, les règles du closing ont changée, aujourd’hui les grandes entreprises les startups on recoure au closer pour vendre leurs produits et services, pourquoi pas vous.
Bien sûr, il ne s’agit pas de manipuler les prospects ou faire de la vente forcer, mais de procéder dans les règles, afin d’être un closer éthique.
Vous, vous doutez bien que les grands noms du business ont bien compris l’importance de faire appel au service d'un closer, c’est pour ça qu’ils sont prêts a payer chère un bon closer.
Aujourd'hui, vous avez le pouvoir de devenir arena closer, grâce aux méthodes que je vais vous enseigner, vous allez court-circuiter les schémas classiques qui consistent a chercher à convaincre le prospect par tous les moyens, mais au contraire vous allez procéder de façon étique et méthodique pour donner confiance au prospect et l'amener progressivement à la vente.

courses.description:
Partamos de algo, todo antes de materializarse son ideas y para que no se nos escapen las pasamos al papel. Lo vemos en la música, en la pintura, en la literatura y también en la redacción creativa. Nos inspiramos y luego nos enfocamos para que nuestras ideas se hagan realidad
Mi nombre es Joan Manuel Flórez Estrada, he sido rector creativo de grandes marcas y en la actualidad soy director creativo general de mi empresa Adflamingo Consultores. En este curso aprenderás el valor de redactar creativamente que fui apuntando en el tiempo gracias a recomendaciones de jefes, libros, videos, cursos y amigos y como aplicar el proceso creativo para que logres enfocarte de la mejor manera a tu público objetivo.
Sé que te gustará redactar creativamente. Por eso te invito a explorar conmigo los videos y que todo este contenido te sea de valor
Por la naturaleza del curso lo que aterrizamos sería algo escrito, pero no siempre, porque hay pintores, dibujantes y muchos más que aterrizan sus ideas en papeles. En el caso de la redacción creativa publicitaria aplicada al marketing debemos tomar en cuenta que la creatividad que nos toca escribir está dirigida por los lineamientos básicos que nos da la empresa dentro de un documento llamado brief. ¿Va quedando claro?
Ahora, dentro de todo este proceso aparece un personaje que se va a encargar de todo salga enfocado ¿Cómo se llama? ¡muy bien! el redactor creativo publicitario que es parte del equipo creativo de una agencia de publicidad ya sea grande o pequeña, y que tiene como función encontrar las ideas más originales para marcar la diferencia en las propuestas publicitarias según el público objetivo de la marca con quien se trabaja con mensajes persuasivos, emocionales creativos y capaces de conectar con las personas.
Comencemos creativ@

In today's competitive business landscape, having a well-defined and effective Go-To-Market (GTM) strategy is essential for success. This comprehensive course on "Strategic Go-To-Market Planning" is designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to create, implement, and refine successful GTM strategies that drive growth and profitability for your organization.
Course Overview: This course will provide a deep understanding of the principles, frameworks, and best practices essential for crafting a robust GTM strategy. Whether you're launching a new product, entering new markets, or revitalizing existing offerings, you will learn how to develop a strategic roadmap that aligns your product or service with your target audience and business objectives.
Key Learning Objectives: By the end of this course, you will be able to:
Understand the GTM Framework: Explore the fundamentals of Go-To-Market strategies, including their importance, key components, and the role they play in business success.
Market Research and Analysis: Master techniques for market research, competitor analysis, and customer segmentation to identify opportunities and challenges.
Product-Market Fit: Learn how to assess product-market fit and adjust your offerings to meet customer needs and preferences.
Segmentation and Targeting: Develop strategies to identify and prioritize target customer segments for your products or services.
Positioning and Messaging: Create compelling product positioning and messaging that resonates with your target audience and differentiates you from competitors.
Distribution and Channel Strategies: Explore various distribution and channel options and select the most suitable ones for your GTM plan.
Pricing Strategies: Understand pricing models and strategies that maximize revenue and profitability.
Sales and Marketing Integration: Learn how to align sales and marketing efforts to effectively reach and convert customers.
Metrics and Performance Measurement: Develop key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of your GTM strategy and make data-driven improvements.
Launch and Execution: Implement your GTM strategy effectively, considering timelines, resources, and risk mitigation.
Continuous Optimization: Discover techniques for monitoring and adapting your GTM strategy as market conditions and customer preferences evolve.
Who Should Attend: This course is ideal for professionals in marketing, product management, sales, and business development, as well as entrepreneurs and small business owners looking to enhance their GTM capabilities. It is suitable for both beginners and experienced practitioners seeking to refine their skills and stay updated with the latest GTM trends.
Course Format: The course will be delivered through a combination of lectures, case studies, group discussions, practical exercises, and real-world examples. Guest speakers from industry-leading organizations may share their insights and experiences.
Join us for this transformative journey in strategic Go-To-Market planning and gain the expertise to drive your organization's success in today's dynamic business environment. Elevate your strategic thinking and become a valuable asset in shaping your company's future. Enroll now and unlock the keys to effective Go-To-Market success!

requirements: Có kiến thức về marketing căn bản
courses.description:
Chào mừng bạn đến với khóa học "Chiến Lược Marketing Dịch Vụ Hoàn Hảo", nơi bạn sẽ được trang bị những kiến thức và kỹ năng cần thiết để xây dựng và triển khai các chiến lược marketing dịch vụ hiệu quả. Trong thế giới kinh doanh ngày nay, dịch vụ chất lượng cao và chiến lược marketing thông minh là hai yếu tố quan trọng giúp doanh nghiệp nổi bật và cạnh tranh. Khóa học này sẽ giúp bạn hiểu rõ cách tối ưu hóa dịch vụ của mình và thu hút khách hàng một cách hiệu quả.


Khóa học được thiết kế dành cho các chủ doanh nghiệp, nhà quản lý, và những người làm trong lĩnh vực marketing, cũng như bất kỳ ai muốn nâng cao kiến thức về marketing dịch vụ. Bạn sẽ được hướng dẫn qua các khái niệm cơ bản và tiên tiến của marketing dịch vụ, từ việc phân tích thị trường, xác định đối tượng khách hàng mục tiêu, đến việc phát triển các chiến lược tiếp thị và đo lường hiệu quả.


Trong suốt khóa học, bạn sẽ tìm hiểu về các mô hình marketing dịch vụ hiện đại, cách xây dựng và quản lý thương hiệu dịch vụ, cũng như cách tạo ra những trải nghiệm khách hàng xuất sắc. Bạn cũng sẽ học cách sử dụng các công cụ và kỹ thuật marketing số để gia tăng tương tác và gắn kết với khách hàng. Các bài tập thực hành và tình huống thực tế sẽ giúp bạn áp dụng những kiến thức đã học vào công việc hàng ngày một cách hiệu quả.


Khóa học không chỉ cung cấp kiến thức chuyên sâu mà còn khơi dậy sự sáng tạo và tư duy chiến lược của bạn. Bạn sẽ học cách tư duy như một nhà lãnh đạo, biết cách định hướng và dẫn dắt đội ngũ của mình trong việc thực hiện các chiến lược marketing dịch vụ. Với sự hướng dẫn của các chuyên gia giàu kinh nghiệm, bạn sẽ nhận được những phản hồi quý giá và học hỏi từ những ví dụ thành công thực tế.


Hãy tham gia khóa học "Chiến Lược Marketing Dịch Vụ Hoàn Hảo" của chúng tôi để nắm bắt những xu hướng mới nhất và phát triển khả năng marketing của bạn lên một tầm cao mới. Đăng ký ngay hôm nay để bắt đầu hành trình nâng cao chất lượng dịch vụ và tạo dựng thương hiệu mạnh mẽ!
target_audience: Người muốn phát triển trong lĩnh vực marketing

Are you ready to start earning money online by selling digital products? In this course, you'll learn how to create, market, and sell your own digital products—whether it’s eBooks, printables, templates, online courses, or other digital goods.
You don't need to be a tech expert to get started. We'll walk you through every step, from finding the right digital product ideas to launching your first product. Learn how to use simple tools to create high-quality products and sell them on popular platforms like Etsy, Gumroad, and Shopify.

courses.title: Yenitoptancı Dropshipping ve XML Eğitimi
courses.bio: Dropshipping, XML, ürün yönetimi ve entegrasyon süreçlerini Yenitoptanci üzerinden adım adım öğrenin.

Giriş: Yenitoptanci.com Nedir? Bayilik ve Yenitoptanci.com Menüleri Detaylı İnceleme

requirements: Bu kurs için herhangi bir ön bilgi veya teknik deneyim gerekmemektedir. Bilgisayar, internet bağlantısı ve temel e-ticaret ilgisi yeterlidir. Yeni başlayanlar için uygundur ve adım adım anlatımlarla herkes kolayca ilerleyebilir.
courses.description:
Aşağıda, harici bağlantılar ve emoji içermeyen, en az 30 kelime daha eklenmiş şekilde genişletilmiş kurs açıklamanızı bulabilirsiniz:
Yenitoptanci Dropshipping, XML Entegrasyonu ve Pazaryeri Satış Eğitimi
Bu kurs, Yenitoptanci platformunu kullanarak dropshipping yapmak isteyen girişimciler ve e-ticaret ile ilgilenen herkes için kapsamlı bir eğitim içermektedir. Dropshipping iş modelinin avantajları, temel çalışma prensipleri ve uygulama yöntemlerinden başlayarak tüm süreçleri adım adım açıklamaktadır.
Kursun içeriğinde XML entegrasyonu ve pazaryerlerinde ürün satışı yapmak için gerekli tüm adımları bulacaksınız. XML nedir, nasıl oluşturulur ve pratikte nasıl kullanılır sorularının yanıtlarını net şekilde öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca ürünlerinizi Trendyol, Hepsiburada, N11 ve benzeri pazaryerlerine hızlı ve doğru şekilde entegre etmeyi öğreneceksiniz.
Kurs boyunca, ürünlerin yüklenmesi, toplu entegrasyon yapılması, siparişlerin alınması ve yönetimi, tedarikçilerle etkili iletişim kurulması, aboneliklerin yönetimi ve iptal süreçleri gibi kritik konular detaylıca ele alınmaktadır.
Öğrenciler bu kursu tamamladıklarında, dropshipping iş modelini kendi başlarına uygulayabilecek, XML dosyalarını oluşturup farklı platformlara entegre edebilecek ve sipariş süreçlerini profesyonelce yönetebilecek seviyeye ulaşacaklardır. Kurs, teknik bilgiye sahip olmayan kullanıcıların dahi rahatça anlayabileceği sade bir dille anlatılmıştır. Tüm içerikler, öğrencilerin kendi işlerini kolayca kurabilecekleri ve e-ticaret süreçlerini başarıyla yönetebilecekleri şekilde hazırlanmıştır.
Ayrıca kursta; toplu ürün güncelleme yöntemlerini, siparişlerinizi tek panel üzerinden yönetmenin kolaylıklarını, iade ve iptal gibi satış sonrası süreçlerin nasıl doğru yönetileceğini detaylı bir şekilde öğreneceksiniz. Eğitim sayesinde pazaryerlerinin istediği yetki belgesinin ne olduğunu ve nasıl alınabileceğini de kavrayarak işletmenizi yasal ve profesyonel zeminde kurabileceksiniz.
İster tamamen yeni başlayın ister daha önce e-ticaret yapmış olun, bu eğitim sizin için faydalı olacak ipuçları ve stratejiler sunmaktadır. Bu kurs, e-ticarette başarı hikâyenizi oluşturmanız için gerekli tüm araçları size sağlayacaktır.
target_audience: E-ticarete başlamak isteyen girişimciler  Dropshipping modelini öğrenmek isteyenler  Ürün entegrasyonu ve sipariş yönetimi yapmak isteyen mağaza sahipleri

Introduction: Finding Your Why and Setting Goals

requirements: An interest in learning ways about promoting and marketing books that don't include paid advertisement and social media
A device to view the course
courses.description:
Book Promotion and Marketing for Self-Published Authors: Ways to Promote and Market Your Book Without Social Media is a course designed to provide you with ideas (besides paid advertisement and social media) to get your book into the hands of more readers.
Many resources provide information on using paid advertisement and/or social media to promote and market books, but this course is not one of them. Instead, this course focuses on ways authors (or future authors) can promote and market their books in inexpensive and even free ways that do not include paid advertisement or social media.
Yes, much of the information found within this course can be found online. But, instead of spending countless hours searching for this information, you can use your time to actually implement some of the tips and strategies within this course to promote and market your book.
Divided into a total of 23 videos including the introduction and conclusion, each video is presented with a slide show presentation as well as a downloadable transcript for your convenience. Handouts are also included with many videos to provide additional resources and information to help you with your promotion and marketing journey.
Taking this course does not guarantee you will sell thousands (or even hundreds) of copies of your book, but it will give you plenty of ideas that may help you get your book into the hands of more readers.
Before deciding if this course is for you, please check out what is and what is not covered within this course below. You are also welcome to watch the course video, introduction video, and video about the realities of self-publishing before choosing if this is the right course for you.
To your publishing, promotion, and marketing success!


Please note: this course is not being continuously updated. Some links and resources may no longer be available or may be outdated. Thank you for understanding.


Who This Course is For:
Authors/Writers with no previous publishing experience who want to learn about promoting and marketing books
Beginner self-published authors looking for ways to promote and market their book(s)
Beginner authors who have published through or who plan to publish through KDP Print or IngramSpark (Not Required)
Unpublished authors who plan to self-publish and are interested in learning ways to promote and market their future book(s)


Who This Course is Not For:
Anyone looking for a get rich quick plan
Anyone wanting information about paid advertisements
Anyone looking for in-depth information on using social media for book promotion


What is Not Covered:
Paid advertisement
Amazon ads
Social media ads
In-depth explanation of social media

courses.bio: Mücevher Satışında Yeni Bilgiler Öğrenin!
objectives: Mücevher Satışı Hakkında Genel Bilgi
Mücevher Servisi

Mücevher Satışı Yapan Kişilerde Olması G: Mücevher Satışı Yapan Kişilerde Olması Gereken Özellikler

requirements: Mücevher satışı hakkında birçok şey öğreneceksiniz.
courses.description:
Mücevher satış eğitiminin amacı, katılımcılara mücevher ürünleri hakkında kapsamlı bilgi vermek, etkili satış becerileri kazandırmak ve mücevher sektörüyle ilgili profesyonel yetkinliklerini artırmaktır. Katılımcıların satış yetenekleri ve ürün bilgileri doğrultusunda daha fazla özgüven kazanmalarını sağlamak, bu sayede müşteri ile olan etkileşimlerini güçlendirmek amaçlardandır. Bir başka amaç da sektörde etik değerler ve profesyonel davranış biçimleri hakkında bilgi vererek, katılımcıların güvenilir bir şekilde hizmet sunmalarını sağlamaktır.
Mücevher satış eğitimi, mücevher satışı için özel satış tekniklerini öğretir. Müşterilerle ilişki kurma, ihtiyaçlarını anlama ve ikna edici bir şekilde ürün sunma becerilerini geliştirir.
Başarılı bir mücevher satıcısı, müşteri memnuniyetini sağlamak için etkili iletişim ve ilişki yönetimi becerilerine ihtiyaç duyar. Eğitim, bu becerilerin gelişimine katkı sağlar.
Eğitim, satış hedeflerinizi belirlemek ve bunlara ulaşmak için gerekli stratejileri öğrenmenize yardımcı olur. Performans takibi ve geliştirme üzerine de bilgiler sunar.
Mücevher satış eğitimleri, katılımcıların ürün bilgisi ve satış becerisi konusunda daha fazla güven duymasını sağlar, bu da müşteriyle olan etkileşimlerde daha başarılı olmalarına yardımcı olur.
Mücevher satış eğitimi, bu sektörle ilgilenenler için kariyerlerini geliştirmek ve daha başarılı olabilmek adına önemli bir fırsattır. Eğitim, mücevher satış konusuna ilgi duyan kişilerin profesyonel gelişimine katkı sağlar. Bu eğitimle birlikte, mücevher sektöründe kariyer yapma veya mücevher satışı alanında uzmanlaşma fırsatları artar. Mücevher satış eğitimi sertifikası, mücevher sektöründeki işverenler tarafından değerli bir nitelik olarak kabul edilir.
target_audience: Mücevher satışına meraklı ve ilgili kişiler

This 7-day challenge will show you how to solve the issues that are plaguing your book.  Stop spending money on promotions, ads, giveaways, and other traffic methods until you've fixed these issues.

The best part is that even after the 7 days you will have lifetime access to all the materials covered.  Miss a day?  Want to spend more time on one particular task?  No problem you can come back to it anytime you'd like.
If you are tired of logging into KDP and seeing no book sales, giving away free copies of your book and getting no reviews, and just the general frustration of not knowing why your book doesn't sell then this challenge is for you.
Are there other methods you could try to fix your book sales?
Of course.
You could buy an expensive course with 500 minutes of video and a 100-page PDF that you will never finish
You could purchase a bunch of individual services to try and fix the problem, even though you aren't quite sure what the problem is

courses.title: Become a 10x Product Marketing Manager with AI & ChatGPT
courses.bio: Revolutionize Your Product Marketing Strategies with AI & ChatGPT - Master the Future of Go-to-Market Excellence
objectives: Master the use of ChatGPT for in-depth market research, enabling precise identification and analysis of customer segments and their specific needs.
Skillfully employ AI tools for developing robust product strategies, enhancing both planning and execution phases for market success.
Learn to effectively prioritize product features using AI, ensuring they align with current market trends and customer demands for better engagement.
Create powerful product visions and value propositions, utilizing AI-driven insights to tailor marketing strategies that resonate with your target audience
Design and implement innovative Go-to-Market strategies using AI, optimizing product launch and market penetration for maximum impact and reach.
Gain expertise in optimizing digital content for SEO with advanced AI tools, significantly enhancing online presence and search engine rankings.
Efficiently manage product development cycles using AI for sprint planning and execution, ensuring timely releases and agile response to market changes.
Harness AI to craft personalized customer experiences, including automated, customized emails & AI-generated FAQs, to enhance customer engagement & satisfaction
Learn how to leverage Perplexity AI for Research and Writing

AI & Product Growth: Long form content creation using ChatGPT Web
AI & Product Execution: Introduction to AI for Product Execution
2024 AI Updates: 2024 AI 5 Things to stay up to date
Perplexity AI for Research and Writing

requirements: No prior experience needed
courses.description:
Embark on an exceptional journey to redefine product marketing with "Become a 10x Product Marketing Manager with AI & ChatGPT." This course is meticulously tailored for those passionate about integrating cutting-edge AI technologies into their product marketing strategies.


Dive deep into the dynamic world of AI, focusing on the practical applications of tools like ChatGPT in transforming your approach to product marketing.


Throughout this comprehensive course, you will explore various facets of product marketing in the AI era. Starting with the basics of ChatGPT and other AI tools, you will gain hands-on experience in employing these tools for innovative marketing strategies. The curriculum then delves into the core of AI & Product Strategy, covering crucial topics like Feature Parity, Custom Research, Product Vision, User Personas, and Monetisation strategies.


The course also offers an in-depth look at AI & Product Growth, highlighting essential aspects like Growth Analysis, Conversion Rate Optimisation, Go-to-Market Strategy, and SEO Optimised Content Creation. You'll learn how to harness AI for effective keyword analysis and research, creating long-form content that resonates with your audience and drives engagement.


In the AI & Product Execution section, the course covers a range of topics from PRD, release notes, and sprint planning to test case automation using AI tools. You will understand the significance of requirement analysis, SQL, and Python in an AI-enhanced product marketing framework.


Furthermore, the AI & Product Experience module focuses on utilizing AI to enhance customer experience. It includes practical lessons on custom research, creating customised emails, AI-generated FAQs, and conducting post-sale customer studies.


And finally, Learn how to leverage Perplexity AI for Research and Writing.


This course is an ideal blend of practical skills and theoretical knowledge, designed for both beginners and experienced professionals. Whether you are stepping into the realm of product marketing or aiming to amplify your existing skills, this course equips you with the knowledge to excel. Enroll now and transform into a visionary Product Marketing Manager who effectively leverages AI and ChatGPT for strategic marketing success.
target_audience: Mid-Level Product Managers and Marketers: Individuals already in product management or marketing roles seeking to leverage AI to innovate and improve their strategies.
Aspiring Product Marketing Managers: Those aiming to break into the field of product marketing with a focus on using AI tools effectively.
Tech-Savvy Entrepreneurs and Start-Up Founders: Business owners looking to integrate AI into their marketing and product development processes for enhanced efficiency and market impact.
Digital Marketing Professionals: Marketers aiming to expand their skill set into AI-powered product marketing and strategy development.
Content Creators in Marketing: Individuals focused on content creation within the marketing domain, looking to enhance their skills using generative AI for more impactful content.
Data Analysts in Marketing Departments: Analysts who want to understand the application of AI in marketing strategies and product development.
Business Development Executives: Professionals responsible for strategic decisions and looking to incorporate AI insights into their product marketing strategies.

courses.title: دورة تعلم التجارة الالكترونية للمبتدئين COD
courses.bio: دورة مجانية أونلاين حول أساسيات التجارة الإلكترونية
requirements: جهاز كمبيوتر
بطاقة التعريف الوطنية
بريد الكتروني
رقم الهاتف
courses.description:
أساسيات التجارة الإلكترونية: كيفية بدء الأعمال التجارية الناجحة عبر الإنترنت". ستتمكن من خلال هذه الدورة من الدخول في عالم ريادة الأعمال وتحقيق دخل إضافي من خلال التجارة الإلكترونية، حيث ستتعلم كيفية تحديد المنتجات القابلة للتسويق وطريقة إنشاء متجر إلكتروني وبناء استراتيجية تسويقية ناجحة لزيادة عدد الزيارات والمبيعات.هذه الدروة بطريقة مبسطة وبخطوات يمكن اتباعها بسهولة.


بالإنجليزية (e-commerce) مصطلح جديد في عالم الاقتصاد ظهر مع انتشار الإنترنت في بدايات التسعينات من القرن العشرين.إلا أن بعض الباحثين أشار إلى وجودها من السبعينات في القرن الماضي من خلال أنظمة تبادل المعلومات الإلكترونية بين الشركات الصناعية (Electronic Data Interchange -EDI).


هي عملية بيع أو شراء أوتبادل المنتجات والخدمات والمعلومات باستخدام شبكة انترنت داخلية أو خارجية .


تتقاطع التجارة الإلكترونية مع العديد من التخصصات مثل المحاسبة ، قانون الأعمال ، علوم الحاسوب، سلوك المستهلك ، الاقتصاد ، الهندسة ، المالية ، إدارة الموارد البشرية ، إدارة نظم المعلومات ، التسويق ، والروبوتات .


تعتبر التجارة الإلكترونية واحدة من التعابير الحديثة والتي أخذت بالدخول إلى حياتنا اليومية حتى أنها أصبحت تستخدم في العديد من الأنشطة الحياتية والتي هي ذات ارتباط بثورة تكنولوجيا المعلومات والاتصالات.


التجارة الإلكترونية تعبير يمكن أن نقسمه إلى مقطعين، حيث أن الأول، وهو “التجارة”، والتي تشير إلى نشاط اقتصادي يتم من خلال تداول السلع والخدمات بين الحكومات والمؤسسات والأفراد وتحكمه عدة قواعد وأنظمة يمكن القول بأنه معترف بها دولياً، أما المقطع الثاني “الإلكترونية” فهو يشير إلى وصف لمجال أداء التجارة، ويقصد به أداء النشاط التجاري باستخدام الوسائط والأساليب الإلكترونية مثل الإنترنت
target_audience: هنا الخطوة الأول في التجارة الالكترونية في الخليج

courses.title: Kurs marketing gier wideo podstawy
courses.bio: Dowiedz się jak wejść na rynek gier wideo, jak zaplanować i przeprowadzić działania marketingowe dla Twojej gry.
objectives: Jak stworzyć strategię marketingową dla gry
Jak wykorzystać platformy społecznościowe
Poznaj popularne wśród graczy platformy do promocji
Ułóż plan marketingowy
Wypromuj grę na Kickstarter
Poznaj sposoby monetyzacji i modele biznesowe
Naucz się korzystać z Google Play Console
requirements: Jest to podstawowy kurs przeznaczony dla twórców gier, którzy chcą rozwinąć swoją wiedze marketingową.
courses.description:
Czego się nauczysz?
Kurs, który masz przed sobą, to idealne wprowadzenie do marketingu gier, zaprojektowany z myślą o osobach, które stworzyły własną grę i chcą ją wypromować. Jeśli chcesz lepiej zrozumieć, jakie działania marketingowe sprawdzają się w tej branży, to ten kurs będzie idealnym wyborem. Pokażę Ci w nim ścieżki dotarcia do potencjalnych odbiorców Twojej gry oraz strategie, które sprawdzają się w promowaniu gry.


Jak zbudować społeczność wokół gier wideo?
W tym szkoleniu pokażę Ci jak rozpocząć promowanie gry, dzięki budowaniu społeczności. Dzięki temu możesz zacząć zdobywać osoby zainteresowane Twoim produktem, nawet jeśli Twoja gra jest jeszcze w fazie rozwoju. Poznasz kluczowe portale, na których znajduje się Twoja grupa docelowa oraz strategie, dzięki którym stworzysz zaufaną społeczność.




Jak promować gry wideo?

Razem z kursem o wiele łatwiej odniesiesz sukces jako projektant gier, niezależnie czy Twoim produktem będzie gra mobilna czy gra wideo na komputery. Pokażę Ci, że za pomocą paru kroków, każdy samodzielnie jest w stanie wypromować grę komputerową, bez względu na to, czy wcześniej miał do czynienia z marketingiem sieciowym.




Poznaj różne sposoby reklamy gier
Przy tak dużej liczbie gier na rynku i silnej konkurencji, by dotrzeć do graczy i zbudować popularność, potrzeba odpowiednich strategii marketingowych. Gracze to zaangażowana, zróżnicowana i stale rosnąca grupa. Ale jakie reklamy sprawdza się najlepiej? Gdzie ich szukać oraz jakie modele biznesowe warto wybrać?
Poznaj metody budowania społeczności, zobacz gdzie szukać graczy, poznaj modele biznesowe oraz jak zarządzać grą z poziomu Google Play Console.
target_audience: Dowiedz się jak wejść na rynek gier wideo, jak zaplanować i przeprowadzić działania marketingowe dla Twojej gry.
Twórcy gier wideo, którzy chcą samodzielnie wypromować własny produkt.

In Essentials to Lead Generation, you'll learn strategies and engagement tactics so that you can begin to generate leads to enhance your sales pipeline. If you're looking to learn how to build a database of prospects, learn more about your target market, and tailor messaging to engage your buyer personas, then this course is for you.

YOUR OUTCOMES
From struggling to high-performing lead generation marketer
From stuck to getting past gatekeepers like a pro
From seen-zoned to engaged prospects
From shy and unsure to navigating difficult conversations confidently
Essentials to Lead Generation is a beginner course for B2B software marketers created by MediaDev.

courses.title: Wordpress: Keysearch Keyword Research, ChatGPT and Yoast SEO
courses.bio: Create Wordpress blog posts with Keysearch keyword research, generated by ChatGPT and optimized with Yoast SEO
objectives: Find What People in Your Niche Want and Give It To Them: Brainstorm keywords in your niche based on what you think they need to know.
Do keyword Research Using Keysearch to Find Blog Titles: Enter your prospective keywords into Keysearch and sort the suggested keywords by their score.
Use ChatGPT to Generate Your Blog Post Text: Ask ChatGPT to write a 500-word post about your chosen long-tail keyword.
Use Yoast Premium SEO to Rank Your Blog Post on Google: Use the Yoast SEO plugin to optimize your post for your keyword to appear on page one of Google search.
Establish Backlinks to Your Site to Increase Your Domain Authority: Increase your domain authority by getting other sites to link to your site and blog posts.
Monitor Your Blog Performance with the Google Site Kit Plugin: It's hard to know if you're improving performance if you don't measure your results.
Embed an Email List Sign-up Form on Your Website: Drive potential customers to your email list sign-up form to market to them forever.

New Blogging Process: Step 1: Find What People in Your Niche Want and Give It To Them
Step 2: Keyword Research Using Keysearch to Find Blog Titles
Step 3: Use ChatGPT to Generate Your Blog Post Text
Step 4: Use Yoast Premium SEO to Rank Your Blog Post on Google
Step 5: Establish Backlinks to Your Site to Increase Your Domain Authority
Addendum: Browsing Your Competition for Backlink Opportunities
Step 6: Monitor Your Blog Site Performance with the Google Site Kit Plugin
Step 7: Embed a Mailing List Sign Up Form on Your Blogging Website

requirements: To follow along with the course, you'll need a Wordpress blog.
You'll need knowledge equivelant to my Udemy course "Create a Wordpress Blog Website: Wordpress Blog Step-by-Step".
courses.description:
Hello and welcome to my course, Wordpress: Keysearch Keyword Research, ChatGPT and Yoast SEO.  In this course, I explain how to write blog posts with ChatGPT, without writing them, and have those posts appear on page one of Google search by using a combination of niche awareness, keyword research using Keysearch and Yoast SEO.  Combined with simple backlink-building techniques, these site-building techniques will elevate your blog to the next level.
This course is about optimizing Wordpress blog posts to increase site visits.
Look, this is a simple course.  Short and sweet, you might say.  But in this course, you will discover the steps to quickly create blog posts that rank on page one of Google search results for your chosen keywords.  Here's how:
Step 1: Find What People in Your Niche Want and Give It To Them
Brainstorm keywords in your niche based on what you think they need to know.
Step 2: Do keyword Research Using Keysearch to Find Blog Titles
In two steps, enter your prospective keywords into Keysearch and sort the suggested keywords by their Keysearch score to find long-tail keywords with good traffic and low competition.
Step 3: Use ChatGPT to Generate Your Blog Post Text
Ask ChatGPT to write a 500-word post about your chosen long-tail keyword.
Step 4: Use Yoast Premium SEO to Rank Your Blog Post on Google
Use the Yoast Premium SEO plugin to optimize your post for your keyword to appear on page one of Google search results.
Step 5: Establish Backlinks to Your Site to Increase Your Domain Authority
Increase your domain authority by getting other sites to link to your site and blog posts.
Step 6: Monitor Your Blog Site Performance with the Google Site Kit Plugin
You can't tell if you're improving something if you don't monitor it.
Step 7: Embed a Mailing List Sign Up Form on Your Blogging Website
The purpose of driving people to your blogging website is not to educate or sell people things, it's to get them to sign up to your mailing list.
Save money on licensing Keysearch (30% off = $11.99 per month) and the expensive Yoast Premium SEO ($5 for life) using discounts outlined in this course.
The process outlined in this course is short, simple and easy to implement.  Most importantly, it's effective.  There is no added fat in this course.  It's succinct and to the point.
Rank your blog posts on page one of Google search results today (actually, it takes days to weeks for things to percolate).  Use your blog to sell products and acquire email list subscribers.
I'll see you in the course,
---Brian
target_audience: This course is intended for students new to blogging and Wordpress SEO.
This course is also appropriate for Wordpress old-timers looking to brush up on the SEO skills.

大數據時代，做生意一定要會運用工具，站在巨人的肩膀上，才有機會獲勝。憑空想像或依靠經驗已經都落伍了，看真實的數據才是王道。前所未有，超強大的商品選擇與市場開發工具，保證讓你看了嘆為觀止，感嘆為什麼沒有早點知道它!

courses.title: Pesquisa de Mercado e Comportamento do Consumidor
courses.bio: Decifrando o Consumidor: Da Pesquisa à Ação Estratégica
objectives: Planejar e desenvolver uma pesquisa de marketing com objetivos claros e métodos eficazes.
Coletar, organizar e interpretar dados de pesquisa para gerar insights relevantes.
Compreender os fatores que influenciam o comportamento do consumidor.
Aplicar os dados obtidos em estratégias práticas para tomada de decisão no marketing.

Introdução: Anlise de Dados de Uma Pesquisa
Identificar os fatores que influenciam o: Identificar os fatores que influenciam o comportamento do consumidor

requirements: Apenas interesse em marketing, comportamento do consumidor ou pesquisa de mercado. Ter um computador ou celular com acesso à internet é suficiente.
courses.description:
No cenário competitivo atual, conhecer o consumidor deixou de ser um diferencial — tornou-se uma necessidade estratégica. O curso "Decifrando o Consumidor: Da Pesquisa à Ação Estratégica" foi desenvolvido para te guiar, passo a passo, por três módulos essenciais que unem teoria e prática para transformar dados em decisões inteligentes.


No primeiro módulo, Desenvolvendo uma Pesquisa de Marketing, você aprenderá como planejar uma pesquisa eficiente, desde a definição do objetivo até a escolha dos métodos de coleta de dados.


No segundo módulo, Análise de Dados de uma Pesquisa, vamos explorar as principais técnicas de leitura e interpretação dos resultados, com foco em transformar números em insights valiosos.


Por fim, no terceiro módulo, Identificar os Fatores que Influenciam o Comportamento do Consumidor, você compreenderá os aspectos psicológicos, sociais e culturais que impactam diretamente nas escolhas de compra.
Ao final do curso, você será capaz de criar e aplicar pesquisas de marketing com clareza, analisar os dados obtidos com senso crítico e tomar decisões baseadas em evidências reais sobre o comportamento do seu público-alvo. Prepare-se para desenvolver estratégias mais eficazes e alinhadas com o que o consumidor realmente deseja.
Bons estudos!
Me siga no @universodasan
e entre no nosso grupo de whatsapp me chamando no 18)988044625

courses.description:
Kursus ini bertujuan untuk memberikan panduan bagi siapa saja yang ingin mulai berjualan online tapi bingung karena tidak memiliki produk sendiri.
Dalam kursus ini akan dijelaskan secara rinci bagaimana cara mulai mengaktifkan toko di Marketplace, memilih parner dropship dan mendaftar, serta mengoptimalkan toko yang sudah dibuat dengan berbagai strategy marketing yang tersedia di marketplace.
Semua materi dalam kursus ini merupakan berdasarkan pengalaman pribadi saya sendiri dalam membangun sebuah toko Marketplace mulai dari 0 dan berhasil menjual total lebih dari 600 produk dalam 7 bulan.
Siapa saja mungkin untuk mendapatkan hasil yang serupa bahkan lebih dari saya jika setelah menyelesaikan kursus ini langsung melakukan eksekusi dari setiap topik pembahasan yang ada dalam kursus ini.
Harapannya, dengan adanya kursus ini lebih banyak lagi anak muda Indonesia yang melek digital dan paham betul bagaimana sistem yang berlaku dalam hal jual beli online. Dengan begitu, pertumbuhan ekonomi dapat bergerak lebih cepat, serta banyak UMKM terbantukan.
Jika ada hal-hal yang kurang jelas dari materi kursus ini bisa ditanyakan dan disampaikan langsung lewat fitur komentar maupun chat langsung kepada saya lewat platform Udemy ini.
Selamat belajar, selamat mencoba hal baru, semoga pengetahuan yang saya bagikan bisa menambahkan nilai tersendiri bagi siapa saja kamu di luar sana!


Salam,
Andre.

courses.description:
Embarking on a journey into the dynamic world of Product Marketing can transform your career and business approach. Whether you're starting fresh or aiming to refine your skills, our comprehensive course, "Learn Product Marketing: Go-To-Market Strategy with Projects" is your gateway to becoming an adept product marketer.


Why this course?
From understanding the foundational elements of product marketing to deploying sophisticated go-to-market strategies, this course covers the A to Z of product marketing essentials. You're not just learning theoretical concepts; you're diving into real-world applications, detailed case studies, and interactive sessions that bridge the gap between knowledge and action.


Course Highlights:
Welcome Aboard: Kickstart your journey with a warm welcome and a guided tour on how to make the most out of this course, setting the stage for an engaging learning experience.
Foundations of Product Marketing: Delve into what sets product marketing apart from brand marketing and product management. Understand the ecosystem in which product marketers thrive and the core responsibilities they bear.
Pre-Launch Excellence: Unpack the strategies that ensure a successful product launch, starting with market research, customer segmentation, and competitive positioning. Learn about the marketing funnel, customer journey, and how to establish a compelling Unique Selling Proposition (USP).
Launch with Impact: Discover the roles and responsibilities of a product marketer during the product launch. Learn how to set SMART goals, identify key performance indicators (KPIs), and prioritize your target audience for a memorable product rollout.
Sustaining Success Post-Launch: Post-launch is not the end of the road; it's a crucial phase for product marketers. Learn how to measure success through revenue, churn, Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC), and Lifetime Value (LTV). Dive into product analysis and testing to iterate and improve.
Exclusive Industry Insights: Gain unique perspectives from industry experts through our coffee chat sessions. Hear directly from successful product marketers about their experiences, challenges, and best practices.


What Makes This Course Unique?
Hands-On Learning: Beyond theoretical knowledge, engage with practical demos, case studies, and real-life scenarios that enhance your learning and application skills.
Expert Insights: Benefit from interviews and discussions with industry leaders, providing you with insider knowledge and cutting-edge practices.
Comprehensive Curriculum: From pre-product launch strategies to post-launch analysis, this course covers every crucial aspect of product marketing, ensuring you're well-equipped to create a go-to-market strategy from start to finish.
Supportive Learning Environment: Our course is designed to foster a supportive community where learners can share insights, ask questions, and engage in meaningful discussions.


Who Should Enroll?
Whether you're a budding marketer, a seasoned professional looking to specialize in product marketing, or a business owner wanting to launch your products successfully, this course is designed to cater to a wide array of learners.
Enroll in "Learn Product Marketing: Go-To-Market Strategy with Projects" today and embark on a learning journey that empowers you to make informed, impactful marketing decisions in the competitive world of products.


More About This Course:
Complex topics are taught in a simple way by instructors with a combined 10+ years of experience, including experience at LinkedIn, Udemy, Lucid, Samsung and strategy consulting
The course is designed to have an even balance between talking head, screen-cast, exercises, and case studies.
Content is clearly organized so more advanced learners can jump in at any point and follow along with the relevant project file.
target_audience: Product marketers
Business owners looking to launch products successfully
Seasoned marketing professionals wanting to hone their skill set
Students curious to learn more about product marketing
Entry level product marketers who want to learn foundational skills

courses.description:
في هذه الدورة التدريبية المتخصصة في التجارة الإلكترونية، ستتعلم كيفية بناء عمل تجاري ناجح على الإنترنت بدءًا من الصفر. ستبدأ الدورة بتعليمك كيفية اختيار المنتج الرابح، أي المنتج الذي يتمتع بطلب عالٍ في السوق. بعد ذلك، ستتعلم طرق شراء المنتج من مصادر مختلفة، سواء من الصين أو من بلدك أو مدينتك، وكيفية تتبع الشحنة حتى تصل إليك.


ستتعلم أيضًا إنشاء صفحة هبوط احترافية ومجانية للمنتج الخاص بك، والتي تعرف بـ Landing Page. هذه الصفحة ستساعدك في جذب العملاء وتحويلهم إلى مشترين. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، ستتعرف على كيفية إطلاق حملات إعلانية مدفوعة على منصات التواصل الاجتماعي مثل فيسبوك وإنستغرام لزيادة مبيعات المنتج.


لن تقتصر الدورة على الإعلانات المدفوعة فقط، بل ستتعلم أيضًا كيفية نشر إعلانات مجانية فعالة للمنتج في عدة أماكن وباستخدام طرق مختلفة. ستتعلم أيضًا كيفية إنشاء صور إعلانية احترافية ومجانية للمنتج الخاص بك، بالإضافة إلى إيجاد مقاطع فيديو ترويجية للمنتج.


بمجرد إتقانك لهذه المهارات، ستكون قد اكتسبت المعرفة اللازمة لإطلاق عمل تجاري إلكتروني ناجح وتحقيق النجاح في هذا المجال المتنامي بسرعة


في النهاية، ستكون قد اكتسبت مجموعة شاملة من المهارات والمعرفة التي تمكنك من إطلاق وتنمية عمل تجاري إلكتروني ناجح. ستكون قادرًا على التكيف مع التغيرات في السوق واستغلال الفرص الجديدة لتحقيق النجاح المستدام. تستثمر هذه الدورة في تطوير مهاراتك ومعرفتك لتصبح رائدًا في مجال التجارة الإلكترونية وتحقيق أهدافك المهنية والشخصية.

courses.title: Amazon Ads (Amazon Advertising) f. Selfpublisher kurz & klar
courses.bio: − Mehr Bücher verkaufen mit Amazon Ads, Aufsetzen der Ads Kampagne, mehr musst Du als Einsteiger nicht wissen.
objectives: Amazon Ads (Amazon Advertising) Kampagne aufsetzen
Sichtbarkeit von Büchern erhöhen
Buchmarketing
Amazon Ads richtig nutzen
requirements: Keine Programmierkenntnisse nötig
Einstige in Amazon Ads
courses.description:
Amazon Advertising ist ein mächtiges Werkzeug, das für viele Selfpublisher auf den ersten Blick nur schwer zugänglich erscheint. Das relativ neue Tool der Amazon-Welt stellt viele Selfpublisher vor Probleme, weil es Arbeit bedeutet, die kaum jemand so richtig durchschaut. Die gute Nachricht ist, dass man das auch nicht durchschauen muss, um es einzusetzen. Als Einsteiger musst Du nicht alles wissen.
Komplexes System
Amazon hat hier ein komplexes System geschaffen, dass für den Großkonzern wiederum mehr Einnahmen generiert. Auf der anderen Seite bietet es die Möglichkeit, Umsätze für den Selfpublisher zu steigern. Lutz Kreutzer, Chef und Organisator des Self-Publishing-Day, zeigt Ihnen in diesem Video-Kurs für Einsteiger, wie Sie schnell und ohne Programmierkenntnisse mit Amazon Ads umgehen und das Tool für sich nutzen können.
Sichtbarkeit erhöhen
Eine Amazon Advertising Kampagne erhöht die Sichtbarkeit von Büchern und E-Books. Selfpublisher können eine solche Werbung  gezielt angehen, in dem sie ihr Bücher als Produkte direkt auf den amazon Plattform an vorauswählbaren Stellen platzieren. Das kann eine Buchseite eines verwandten Buches sein oder auch eine Kategorie.  Abgerechnet wird in Pay per Click, also nur dann, wenn ein potentieller Käufer die Werbung auch anklickt, um auf die Buchseite zu gelangen. Dazu kann der Anbieter - also der Selfpublisher - selbst bestimmen, wie viel ihm ein Klick wert ist.
Der Kurs eignet sich als Grundkurs für Anfänger.
target_audience: Erfahrene und weniger erfahrene Selfpublisher
Einsteiger in Amazon Advertising

A lo largo del curso, aprenderá todo sobre el arte de la redacción publicitaria, desde la comprensión de la psicología del consumidor hasta técnicas avanzadas de redacción persuasiva. El curso "Experto en redacción publicitaria" está diseñado para cualquiera que busque mejorar sus habilidades de escritura, incluidos emprendedores, profesionales del marketing digital, escritores y estudiantes de comunicación. Ya sea que sea principiante o tenga experiencia en redacción publicitaria, este curso es perfecto para aquellos que desean llevar sus habilidades de redacción al siguiente nivel.


A través de lecciones prácticas y ejemplos del mundo real, aprenderá a crear textos para diferentes tipos de empresas y audiencias objetivo, desde pequeñas empresas hasta grandes corporaciones. El curso "Experto en Copywriting" es impartido por un profesional con experiencia en copywriting y marketing digital, quien te enseñará todas las técnicas y estrategias que ha utilizado con éxito en sus propios negocios. Tendrá acceso a materiales de apoyo, listas de verificación y ejercicios prácticos para aplicar lo que ha aprendido.


Con este curso aprenderás a:

Este curso es la oportunidad perfecta para que domines el arte del copywriting y destaques en un mercado cada vez más competitivo. No pierdas la oportunidad de mejorar tus resultados de marketing digital y potenciar tus ventas online. ¡Inscríbase ahora en el curso "Experto en redacción publicitaria" y comience a crear textos persuasivos y eficaces hoy mismo!

courses.description:
Audibleだけでなく、audiobook. jpでオーディオブック出版をする方法も収録しています！


インターネット最後のブルーオーシャン「オーディオブック出版」。


オーディオブック市場はものすごい勢いで拡大を続け、2024年には市場規模が260億円にまで到達すると言われています。
日本人のオーディオブック利用者は100万人を越えていると言われています。


これだけポテンシャルがあるマーケットにもかかわらず、参入者が非常に少ないのが特徴。


オーディオブックを制作・販売しているのは大手出版社が中心で、僕が参入したとき個人でオーディオブック出版をしている人は皆無でした。


まだまだ競合が少ないので、今参入すれば間違いなく先行者利益を獲得することができます。


オーディオブック出版はコストがほとんどかからず、しかも在庫リスクもありません。


プラットフォームが集客や販売を代わりにやってくれるので、出版後は完全放置で収益が自動発生します。


つまり、不労所得を構築できるということです。


電子書籍のコンテンツを音声コンテンツとして使いまわすだけなので、ゼロからアイデアを考える必要がありません。


電子書籍とセットで出版すれば、
１つのコンテンツでキャッシュポイントを倍に増やすことができます。


個人起業家や副業などで電子書籍を出版している人はたくさんいます。


電子書籍市場は競争が激しいので、
自分の本を見つけてもらうだけでも至難の業です。


どんなに良い本を出版したとしても、
見つけてもらうことができなければ1円も稼ぐことはできません。


オーディオブック出版は競争相手が極端に少ないブルーオーシャンなので、
ユーザーにカンタンに見つけてもらうことができます。


無名の一般人の作品であったとしても、
購入してもらえる確率がかなり高いのです。


「オーディオブックを出版してみたいけど情報が見つからない」


という人のために、39冊のオーディオブックを出版し、ポッドキャストで1000エピソード以上投稿している音声コンテンツのエキスパートの僕が、Amazon Audibleでオーディオブックを出版する方法について徹底解説します。
target_audience: Kindle電子書籍の収益をさらに拡大したい人
新しい副業を探している人
リスクゼロのビジネスを始めたい人
不労所得を構築したい人

courses.description:
Arkadaşlar hoşgeldiniz!
Size kısaca yol haritamızın kapsamından bahsetmek isterim!


Önce temel seviyede satış becerilerinizi inceleyeceğiz!
Kim olduğunuzu birlikte keşfedeceğiz!
Bu sektör için uygun olup olmadığınıza karar vereceğiz!
Yıldız bir satışçı olmanın ilk adımını atacağız!
Üzerine satış mühendisliğini inşa edeceğiz!
Yüz yüze satış, telefonda satış, randevu yönetimi, toplu satış konularının hepsini sistematik olarak öğreneceğiz!
Peki nasıl?
Sizlere hayal satma amacında değilim!
İşimizin tüm zorluklarının farkında biri olarak sürekli kolaylaştırmaya ve keyif almaya yönelik ilerleyeceğiz!
Minimum efor ile maksimum satışı nasıl elde edeceğimizi öğreneceğiz!
Motivasyonumuzu nasıl diri tutacağımızdan bahsedeceğiz!
Evde çalışmanın dezavantajlarını nasıl avantaja çevireceğimizden bahsedeceğiz!
Bazen en iyi satışın yapılmayan satış olduğunu öğreneceğiz!
Müşteri itirazlarını nasıl bertaraf edeceğimizi öğreneceğiz!
İknanın psikolojisini öğreneceğiz!
Satışın ne olmadığını öğreneceğiz!
Sıfırdan zirveye kadar bir satış sürecinde neler olmalı başka bir eğitime ihtiyaç bırakmadan ilerleyeceğiz!
Geleneksel satış taktiklerini bir kenara bırakarak bu süreci uygulanabilir bilimsellikle ele alacağız!
Satış sürecinde ihtiyaç duyacağınız tüm konuları detaylıca anlatacağız!
Yorumlarınız doğrultusunda kurs içeriğini zenginleştirerek ilerleyeceğiz!
Sorularınıza içtenlikle cevap vereceğimi bilmenizi isterim!
Satış sektörüne yabancı, satış yapmaktan korkan, konuşmaktan çekinen, içine dönük kişilerden, profesyonel satış ekibi yöneten bir yıldız satışçı için de öğrenmesi gerekenler bu eğitimde olacaktır!
Siz öğrenmeye açık olduğunuz müddetçe hep birlikte yol yürüyeceğiz!
Ve sizlerde bilginin verdiği özgüvenle geleceğe daha sağlam ilerliyor olacaksınız!


Haydi başlayalım!
Olumlu veya olumsuz eleştirilerinizin zayıf kaslarımızı geliştirmeye yarayacağı bilincindeyim!


Kim ki satışı bilir, dünyayı yönetebilir!


Yusuf Aras
target_audience: Ürün ya da hizmet satışında profesyonel olmak isteyen satış alanında çalışanlar.

Satışta motivasyon konusunda istikrar sağlayamayanlar.
Yıllardır satışta bulunan ama müşteri adaylarını istediği seviyede satışa taşıyamayanlar. Yüksek satış rakamlarına ulaşamayanlar.
Bir satışı neden kaybettiğini analiz etmekte sıkıntı çekenler.
Müşterisinden, müşteri adayı kazanmak isteyenler.
Ekiplerini iyi yönetemeyenler. Daha etkili yönetim sistemlerini nasıl kurarım diyenler.
Satış toplantıları, CRM sistemleri ve satış yöneticiliği hakkında gerçek bilgi arayanlar.

courses.bio: Master advanced GTM frameworks: PLG, Category Design, Pricing, Sales Enablement, Tiered Global Launch Planning
objectives: Develop and execute a complete, end-to-end Go-to-Market strategy for any product or service.
Implement a full Product-Led Growth (PLG) strategy to build products that drive their own acquisition and conversion.
Craft a unique Value Proposition and apply advanced frameworks like Category Design to position your product as a market leader.

Create advanced pricing and packaging models for SaaS and digital products to maximize revenue and adoption.
Analyze GTM performance using key business metrics like LTV, CAC, and Pipeline Velocity to prove marketing ROI.
Develop a strategic plan for international expansion and product localization.
Conduct advanced market analysis to define a data-driven Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) and user personas.
Build and manage an indirect GTM channel strategy by creating a powerful partner ecosystem.

Case Studies of Successful GTM Optimization

requirements: For a better learning experience, we suggest you to use a laptop / mobile phone / pen and paper for taking notes, highlighting important points, and making summaries to reinforce your learning.
A basic understanding of general business or marketing concepts will be beneficial but is not strictly required. The foundational modules are designed to get you up to speed.
Most importantly, you need a strong desire to learn and a passion for building and launching successful products!
courses.description:
Welcome to course: Product Marketing: Advanced Go-to-Market (GTM) Strategy by MTF Institute


Are you ready to stop just participating in product launches and start leading them? In crowded market, a great product isn't enough. A strategic, data-driven, and masterfully executed Go-to-Market (GTM) strategy is what separates market leaders from forgotten failures. This course is your complete blueprint for building and executing that strategy.


Master the Entire Go-to-Market Lifecycle from Strategy to Global Execution.


Whether you're an aspiring Product Marketer or a seasoned professional looking to master the latest frameworks, this comprehensive program will give you the tools, confidence, and in-depth knowledge to drive impactful product launches and accelerate business growth.
Master Modern GTM Motions like Product-Led Growth (PLG) to build products that sell themselves.
Define and Dominate Your Market by learning the advanced art of Strategic Messaging and Category Design.
Price Your Products with Confidence by moving beyond simple models to advanced, value-based pricing and packaging strategies.
Launch with Precision using a professional Tiered Launch Framework for everything from a quiet update to a blockbuster release.
Build a Revenue Machine by creating a high-impact Sales Enablement program and a powerful partner ecosystem.




Go-to-Market Strategy is the single most critical function for driving product success. It’s the strategic bridge between building a great product and creating a thriving business. A great GTM plan aligns your entire company—from product and marketing to sales and support—on a single mission: to effectively deliver your product's value to the ideal customer. This course demystifies that process, providing you with a step-by-step guide to navigating every stage with the expertise of a seasoned leader.


What makes this course unique? It’s a complete masterclass, structured in three powerful parts:
The Foundation (Video Lessons): We begin with engaging video lessons covering the fundamentals of Product Management and Development. You'll get a solid grounding in the entire product lifecycle, from idea generation and agile development to product metrics.


The Core GTM Playbook (Textual Lessons): Next, you'll dive into a comprehensive textual module covering the 10 foundational pillars of Go-to-Market Strategy. This section ensures you have a rock-solid understanding of market analysis, value proposition, pricing, launch planning, and more.


The Advanced Masterclass (NEW Expert Textual Modules): This is where this course truly stands apart. We go far beyond the basics with 10 brand new, expert-level modules on advanced GTM strategy. This is an MBA-level deep dive into the modern frameworks that are defining the future of marketing:
Advanced Market Intelligence & ICP Definition
Strategic Messaging, Positioning & Category Design
Advanced Pricing & Packaging Strategies
Mastering Product-Led Growth (PLG)
Building a High-Impact Sales Enablement Program
GTM Channel Strategy: Building a Partner Ecosystem
The Tiered Launch: From MVP to Blockbuster
Post-Launch Optimization & Customer Marketing
GTM Analytics: Measuring What Matters
Global GTM: International Expansion & Localization


This course is brought to you by the MTF Institute, an official partner of IBM, Intel, and Microsoft, and led by Dr. Alex Amoroso, a seasoned professional and academic with deep expertise in strategy, product development, and research methodologies. You will learn proven frameworks grounded in both academic rigor and real-world business success across a wide range of industries.
By the end of this course, you will not just understand Go-to-Market strategy; you will have a complete, actionable playbook to plan, execute, and measure winning product launches throughout your career.


Ready to become a GTM expert? Enroll today and start building winning go-to-market strategies!


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance
MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.
MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.
MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.
MTF is present in 217 countries and has been chosen by more than 800 000 students.


Course Author:
Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.
In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.
In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.
Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.
With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.
target_audience: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Product Management or improve their knowledge.
Aspiring or current Product Marketers who want a comprehensive, A-Z playbook for Go-to-Market strategy.
Product Managers who want to master the commercial side of their role and ensure their products succeed in the market.
Marketing Managers and Leaders who are responsible for planning and executing product launches.
Entrepreneurs and Startup Founders who need to develop a winning GTM plan to launch their new venture.
Sales Leaders and Enablement Professionals who want to understand the strategic GTM context behind the sales targets.
Business Strategists and Consultants who advise clients on product and market strategy.

courses.description:
If you are involved in business or marketing, you will always think of generating new idea, creating new products and offering more benefits to your end-users. It is always true. Competition is like swimming upstream, you only go forward or backward. You can not stay in the same position.


New products are the major driver of revenue growth in today's dynamic business environment. In this course, I organized knowledge into useful and insightful frameworks, covering all aspects of new product development: concept template, key principles to develop concepts, key principles to find winning insights, steps of finding winning insight, creating product platform, etc.


THIS IS A DISTINCT GUIDE COURSE YOU HAVE EVER GOT!
I am not an academic theorist. I am a professional marketing expert in both traditional business and non-traditional business. I tried to keep this course as short and concise as possible because I can understand that businessmen or managers like us don’t have much time.

objectives: Determine writing goals from the outset

Introduction: Get The Most You Can From The Course

Why Do You Want To Be A Writer ? (Notes)

How To Write The Best Book You Can (Notes)

What Is The Independent Route To Publish: What Is The Independent Route To Publication (Notes)
Did Your First Book Bomb?: Did Your First Book Bomb? Notes

requirements: A smartphone or laptop
courses.description:
What is the title of this course?
‘Amazon KDP Self Publishing: A Comprehensive A-Z How To Guide’


Who is it for?
You and absolutely everyone else who aspires to write, whether you are just starting out or have a part-work gathering dust in a drawer or on a half-forgotten computer file. Whether you’re retired or retiring soon and want to fulfil a long-standing ambition to write a book, or at the beginning of your writing career and looking to set up a solid foundation.


What does it cover?
By the time you complete the course, even if you are a complete beginner, you will be in a position to self-publish a deftly-plotted, well-written book in an attractive cover for an audience of thousands of readers in your genre who have subscribed to your author newsletter. And if you are already on your author journey, you can skim through the lecture descriptions and pick and choose whatever looks useful.


Why is this course the best?
The course is comprehensive. It’s well-organized. Every lecture contains need-to-know information. It’s a step-by-step guide that will take you from your original idea to print. Each section is supported by notes: summaries, useful websites and resources.


Why will this information change or improve my life?
It will save you time. You will make mistakes on your author journey, for sure, but at least you can avoid making the mistakes I made. It will save you money. I made some costly blunders but I also made some good decisions in subscribing to particular sites.


Why should I care?
If you have a burning desire to share your stories, this course is a step-by-step blueprint to get you from A to Z. You will gain a huge sense of satisfiction in seeing your work in print. The hard work will have been worth it.


Why is now the time to learn this topic?
In my experience, and no doubt in yours, ‘Now’ is always the best time to start. You never know what’s round the corner. Start now and you will continue. Continue and you will complete.


Why are you the best teacher for this topic?
Not only am I a highly qualified teacher, but I also set up and ran a successful education company for many years. Thousands of students took the courses I wrote with very high satisfaction rates. I am also on my own author journey and have self-published several books. So with my background and experience, I am well-placed to deliver a hands-on course in a serious but engaging way.


Do you get excited about teaching the course?
Researching, writing, revising, recording and editing this course has been a labour of love. Fortunately, I love teaching. I have been a teacher all my working life. But what is most rewarding is the success of my students.


Now let me pose a question.
How many sales do you need to make in your launch week for your book to take off via word of mouth?
According to a niche London-based publisher, it’s 2000.
This course has one paramount aim. To find those 2000 sales you need in your launch week.


And here’s how
First, I will show you how to research the market before you start writing, so you write a book that readers in your genre will love. It’s a strategy called ‘Writing to Market’.
So. Step One. You now have a book that people want to read.


Secondly, I will show you how to format your book beautifully so that you can upload it to Amazon without a glitch. And I will show you how to create free or bespoke book covers that will appeal to your market.
So. Step Two. You now have a book just one click away from going live on Amazon.


3. Thirdly, I will show you how to find thousands of readers in your genre completely legitimately who will happily subscribe to your opt-in email list.


So. Step Three. When you publish your book you will already have a substantial pool of buyers, before you even start advertising.


4. And fourthly, I will show you how to create buzz across the Author Platform we’re going to build leading up to your book launch on Amazon


So. Step Four. You’re a published author and your book is selling. So what next?


Now you’ve been through the process once, it’s going to be so much easier to publish your second book.


I’m Charles Palmer. Former Assistant Headteacher. Former CEO of a successful London-based education company. And now an independently published author and course creator.


Welcome to my course.


This course contains over seven hours of content on how to self-publish your book.
Here’s what’s inside.


How to work out what your writing goals are.
How to set yourself up for success.
How to write the best book you can.
What the Traditional Route is.
What the Independent Route is.
How to overcome procrastination and minimize distractions.
How to re-launch a book that bombed.
How to create both free and bespoke book covers.
How to create a reader magnet.
How to build a large opted-in email list of subscribers interested in your genre.
How to maintain your email list and keep your subscribers happy.
How to create your author brand.
How to create and activate your author social media platform.
What to consider when creating your author website.
How to upload your ebook and other book formats to Amazon.
How to get 4* and 5* reviews.
How to find your way round Amazon promotion and advertising tools.
How to organize your book launch.


If you’d like to get access to all this, then click the button to enrol. I’d love us to work together.
target_audience: Authors who want to self-publish who are at or close to the beginning of their author journey

courses.title: Unofficial - Udemy Course Creation, Management & Marketing
courses.bio: Learn techniques for creation, management and marketing of your Udemy courses in this unofficial course creation guide

Introduction: Making the most of this course

requirements: None
courses.description:
Learn how to create, manage and promote your Udemy course, using internal and external techniques, all whilst staying within the limits of policies allowed by Udemy themselves. Note that all information on this course is correct at the time of publication, however this may be subject to change at any time, be sure to check official pages for the latest information.


Some of the topics covered on this course are as follows:


* How to use features such as educational announcements and promotional announcements - these have different uses and different rules surrounding them, and these are important to remember when you are promoting your course.
* How to use the marketing insights tools to optimise your keywords - these are unique depending on your course and it's content, and can often change as well with time.
* How to connect with the audience of your course - Make sure that you are providing valuable and educational content (this is actually a requirement to get a course approved)
* Making use of the video test features - get feedback from Udemy themselves before you even finish recording your course, i.e. make sure that your camera and mic setup would pass the quality review guidelines.


On completing this course, you should have a better understanding of how course creation, management and marketing works on the Udemy platform.
target_audience: Udemy instructors that are looking for ways to market their courses more effectively

courses.description:
Hai Sobat Ilmu! Pernahkah kamu berpikir untuk memulai bisnis di bidang kuliner ? Tapi bingung bagaimana cara memulainya ? Kelas ini dapat menjadi solusi untuk Kamu. Dalam memulai suatu bisnis, tekad yang kuat saja belum cukup, namun diperlukan juga adanya pengetahuan terhadap kebutuhan pasar, bagaimana tahapan-tahapan dalam membangun bisnis serta strategi-strategi agar bisnis yang akan Anda bangun dapat beradaptasi di pasar.
Hal ini termasuk bagaimana cara memanfaatkan platform online guna mendongkrak penjualan bisnis Anda. Kelas ini sangat cocok untuk Anda yang punya keinginan untuk memulai bisnis sendiri, khususnya pada bisnis makanan namun masih ragu-ragu dan bingung apa yang harus dilakukan. Karena pada kelas ini, akan dibahas dari mulai hal dasar seperti menentukan bisnis model yang ingin Anda jalankan sampai bagaimana cara meningkatkan penjualan dengan cara online salah satunya dengan grabfood maupun gofood dan cukup dari rumah saja.
Dibawakan oleh trainer yang telah berpengalaman yaitu Muhammad Irsan dengan pengalamannya yaitu merupakah owner salah satu rumah makan yang juga aktif penjualan melalui gofood dan grab food beliau juga merupakan pengajar yang bersertifikasi BNSP dan pada materi ini akan diberikan informasi dalam menjalankan berbagai macam bisnis dengan bahasa yang sederhana sehingga akan terasa menyenangkan dan tentunya akan mudah untuk Anda praktekkan nantinya. Yuk segera daftar dan ikuti kelas ini!
target_audience: Pelatihan ini cocok untuk peserta yang ingin bekerja dibidang konsultan F&B/Kuliner, atau ingin memulai usaha secara mandiri dibidang makanan. Cocok juga untuk freelancer di bidang digital marketing.
